Summary Heading: Good hotel for the Disneyland trip
Summary: They provide a shuttle bus that leaves from the main entrance every 15 minutes which is extremely helpful. Its just a 5 minute trip to the Disneyland shuttle drop off. The hotel lobby was inviting and warm and reception was helpful. The room itself was old and one of the biggest I've stayed in. It was just my wife and myself but it had 2 super kings or queens in it and still plenty of space in it for a couple more but the bathroom was extremely small. The toilet is right next to the shower so unless the door is fully closed, there is nowhere to stand. The carpet was old and stained but this is not to say the room was dirty because it was a light coloured carpet and most hotels I've noticed use dark colours to hide stains. It was a quiet hotel and the beds were comfortable and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay here with us. We will share your comments with the rest of the management team. Thank you!

Summary Heading: the shuttle to disneyland is great
Summary: Firstly the front reception staff, the hospitality manager and the bell staff are great.  Unfortunately we did not have a great start to the hotel stay but after speaking to management, things improved.  The bus to disneyland is great especially after a day at the park.  The airconditioner in our room blew on our faces when we were in bed so we turned it off.  Not sure if that was just the room we were in.  The rooms are big and the housecleaning staff do a great job each day - our room was always cleaned well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we are pleased that your overall stay was a positive one. Please come back and stay with us again. Thanks!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you're going to disney
Summary: I have to say that I didn't expect this hotel to be this big. I had the idea that I was going to stay at a small cozy place but, wow. This thing is huge, nice and very well maintained by the way. Service was Ok, nothing spectacular but nothing to moan about either. They have shuttles to Disneyland every 20 minutes or so, which is very appreciated. At first, I thought that the parks were in walking distance, but they're really not. The problem is not actually the distance, but you have to cross a boulevard and it's not really safe to do that, specially if you're traveling with kids. Parking was $14 for the day, which is a fair price. I've been in places that charge twice as much. The parking lot is huge as well, no problem to find a spot. Restaurant was good, a little pricey but
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us, we are pleased you enjoyed the time at the hotel. We hope you'll be back again soon. Thanks.

Summary: Loved every minute of our stay. We arrived very early for Australia and were able to check in straight away. The hotel and level of service was fantastic. Plus the free shuttle bus to Disney certainly came in handy. Darine at the reception helped sort out our crazy Air Canada moments, she was easily the best  of a great bunch of staff. Will recommend this Hotel to any one needing a great place to rest and recover during their Disneyland adventures.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here the last week of September 2016.  Large, clean room with comfortable bed and nice pillows. Bathroom is a little small, but it was fine. Nice tall shower head. It has a vanity area just outside the bathroom, but no outlet, so I had to use the one in the bathroom for the blow drier so only one person can shower and use the bathroom at a time.  Huge comfortable lobby with several seating areas.  Small café for quick food and coffee items and indoor/outdoor restaurant.  The grounds are really pretty: koi pond, gazebo, pool, large grassy area and places to sit outside.  Free shuttle to and from Disneyland.  Very friendly and helpful staff and concierge.  The hotel must be located very close to where the Disneyland fireworks are set off, because  it sounds like a war zone
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Coudlnt fault this place ! Everyone was so inviting and full of information !   So close to disneyland.. the shuttles are amazing and it was nice to have lush gardens surrounding us !   Breakfast buffet in the morning needs an overhaul but apart from that very good !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Bathroom door can't be locked. Bathtub wasn't clean, Side lamps were faulty. Only thing that this hotel has in it's favor is it's location. My advice for someone new is to find something better. Don't ruin a small part of your vacation over this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  I am very sorry to hear that your stay at the hotel was not up to par.  Please not that this information has been passed on to our concerned staff.  Despite this, we hope to be able to welcome you back on a return visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Our Family looked at all of those closer locations close to the entry, and thought Majestic Gardens might be a pain in the bum. but I was 100% wrong, with there bus that travels every half an hour from the hotel, and can pick you up 1 hour after the park closes. this is the best option, and a great hotel to top it off. we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Super stay ... Perfect hotel for Disney
Summary: We stayed for a week and it was perfect. Nice smart hotel with good facilities of bar and restaurant. Super room ... One of the premium rooms, very clean and large  though brighter lighting would be good. Bathroom clean but very small. Lovely pool with cabanas too ... Floor needed a daily clean.  Staff friendly and helpful. Lovely lobby area with fireplace and seating areas.  Grounds very pretty with koi pond and fountains. Restaurant good and wonderful free shuttle to Disney worked like a dream with very helpful drivers too. Smartest buses at Disney including Disneys own!  Parking charges reasonable, very centrally located. Perfect place to see Disney fireworks from too. Really close overhead due to proximity of Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Our family really liked this friendly hotel which was mainly driven by its location. A short 15 minute walk to the gates of disney or downtown. We walked everyday sometimes twice, obviously if you are not a walking family this won't appeal to you however the shuttle seemed to always be ready to go. The rooms were clean and a fair size, the pool was nice and big and not crowded and the gym was kitted out and never busy. The bar and bar staff (including the security guards) were super friendly and after just one night knew I was a double gin rather than a single. Obviously like all hotels the bar prices are steep so just attend the happy hour and bring that price down.  The car park cost was quite high but this hotel isn't alone in charging.  There are no room safes but safe boxes
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We had two rooms, with adjoining doors.  The rooms were clean and very spacious.  It had a fridge, which was nice to put our goodies from downtown Disney in.  The shuttle leaves every half hour to Disneyland and was very convenient.  We stayed here for the Disney marathon weekend as my daughter was running.  It was the perfect location hotel to stay in.  We were able to walk to the starting line very easily.  I appreciate they opened their little store early on running day and we were able to get coffee and a bagel before heading across the street for the run.  The employees are very nice.  We had a drink in the bar one night.  They have a restaurant but we didn't eat there, rather we ate in Downtown Disney.  Overall I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review our property.  I am glad to hear that we will be your top choice when you visit Anaheim.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We had an updated "castle"room which was nice but not overly exciting. It faced the pool which could be noisy and crowded but it wasn't a problem. We are used to staying in cheap motel 6 type hotels so this was definitely a nice change, but it had its own issues. It is an older hotel that is showing its age in many areas. The windows are all old, even in our updated room. Our room was HUGE but the bathroom tiny and uncomfortable and obviously not updated. They just changed the wallpaper and light fixture. The whole hotel smelled like smoke because people can smoke in random areas. The restaurant was just ok, and all the staff, while friendly and helpful, seemed annoyed to even have to be there. Cute theming. Didn't utilize the Disneyland shuttle this trip but seems very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Loved loved loved this hotel. The staff were very helpful and friendly and the room was HUGE. We had a sofa, table, chair, fridge, desk. Everything anyone could want. The bed was so comfy. The hotel has a free shuttle to Disney which we made use of. The food in the hotel was very tasty and moreish. From our window we were able to see the Disney fireworks on a night. The hotel was set in the theme of castle, which looked amazing. Wish I could have stayed longer than the 2 days.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: The Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel was the perfect setting for Kristen and Daulton's fairy tale wedding.  The theme was Beauty and the Beast.  The rehearsal dinner was delirious and the service was impeccable.  Even thought it was like nailing Jello to the wall, the waitstaff was patient and efficient.  They were told that our great-grandson had a birthday coming up so there was a Disney birthday card and balloons for him.  A nice, special touch - typical of the hotel.. The wedding the next day was in a beautiful garden setting , the coordinator was super patient!  The ceremony was perfect.  The reception, food service,, etc. was everything a princess bride could ask for.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: We stayed in the Anaheim Majestic from Sept. 9-19, 2016.  There were 5 of us.  My husband, young dd and I had an adjoining room with our family that opened out to the pool area.  On the weekends we saw Disney's amazing fireworks display from our windows (I've never seen fireworks so close--and huge!--before.)  The rooms were spacious and clean, and my bed was the most comfortable hotel bed I think that I've ever slept in.  All of the staff that I interacted with were friendly and accommodating.  The hotel is a short drive from the Disney Parks and Knotts Berry Farm (you're looking at a much longer drive if you want to visit LEGOLAND or Universal Studios.)  We ate at both the hotel restaurant and the deli.  I thought the restaurant was decent (one waiter was especially fantastic
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Hotels near Disneyland
Summary: We were able to check in early and got a free room upgrade. The room was nice, and it was clean. It had a view of the pool area, which looked very nice. The shuttle service to Disneyland was an added bonus! Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Worst stay at a hotel ever!!
Summary: First, I booked and paid for a room with a view. The room was on the first floor and we didn't even have a view of the garden. After talking it over with my party we decided to just stay im the room because we were tired from traveling. Secondly, we know the hotel isn't a smoking hotel, so we ask the clerk that checked us in where we could smoke and she said in the garden. So that's what we did. Our room had a door with acess to the garden so we smoked outside of that door (because it was lead us outside to the garden). Well when we get to check out, the clerk told me that in order for me to get my $100 incidental fee back(which I had no idea I had to pay), house keeping would have to check the room. So the clerk, house keeping, AND THE CLERKS SUPERVISOR (???) decided that the
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  I am very sorry to hear that your stay at the hotel was not up to par.  Please not that this information has been passed on to our concerned staff.  Despite this, we hope to be able to welcome you back on a return visit to Anaheim.

Summary: 3 of us shared a 2 queen room. The room was clean, basic, nothing special. I advised it for you to get a garden room, if you're by the street or freeway it is extremely loud to the point where you will not sleep. staffing service was great everyone was friendly and helpful. The shuttles were on time and easy to use. If the staff wasn't so friendly I would give it a one star.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and feedback, we appreciate it and hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary Heading: Nice grounds and remolded of a old hotel with a good location to the Disneyland marathon start/finish line.
Summary: Overall the hotel was ok. Nice grounds and decorated rooms. Amazing view of the fireworks from Disneyland outside the entrance of the hotel. My room had a old musty odor, I guessing because it's a old building. Also, I found the breakfast service slow because I didn't order the breakfast buffet, so there must have been very few waitresses. The only big problem I encountered was on their complimentary shuttle.  On the way back from Disneyland the driver forgot that I was in the shuttle and left me in there near the employee parking lot with no way out. He never heard me knocking on the door window and had to call the front desk. The driver laughed at me when he returned from his private vehicle. 😡 All I got was a apology from the hotel manager and explanation that he forgot that
Manager Response: I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary: My only problem with this hotel is the location. The rooms are huge and clean, think it was formerly a Sheriton. It is ideally place for Disney. Unfortunately it is not a good location for Universal or Warner Bros or Hollywood Boulevard. It took us an 1 and 1/2 hours to get across LA to those places. Not long after we arrived we had a fantastic view of the Disney fireworks which was lovely. The food was good and no more expensive than anywhere else we have stayed in California. There were nice gardens and a pool which we didnt get to use, but there was a good games room to play pool and air hockey and a few coin machines, which our teenagers enjoyed. The hotel has been clad in "old stone" and has a tower so looks a bit like a castle which would be lovely for small children.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that you will recommend us to a friend.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: So last year we spent the well worth it money to experience Disneyland Hotel and it was amazing! But very very very expensive! This year we gambled on a hotel close to the park,hoping magic was about there as well? And I have to admit besides the Insane savings the tudor castle style of the hotel was a great theme and I was hopeful!  But I never could have imagined that someone like Darine at the front counter would wave her wand and go out of her way to put us in such a magical room! It made our trip. She really cared about our experience and I wanted to thank her for that! It's never the accomadations that make your stay it's the people there day and night making sure it's what you expect and more. So thank you Darine for meeting our expectations and more!!! Your little bar
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: We visited Anaheim as our last stop on our west coast trip. The drive from Monterey to Anaheim is beautiful until you hit LA and then it's a nightmare! Once you push passed the traffic it's great. We got to the majestic gardens quite late after a day of travelling and my first impressions were good. The check in staff were lovely and gave us clear instructions on where to go as the hotel is massive. The hotel has a lovely reception area (if not slightly dark) with a nice coffee shop which sells salad, sandwiches, crisps etc and a really nice bistro. We ate in there once at it was very nice. Our room was nice and comfortable (we were facing the road so the view wasn't so good). Housekeeping was great, did a very good job. The pool area is pleasant after a full day but the pool is
Manager Response: We appreciate your positive feedback about our hotel.  We do take price in catering to our guests’ needs the best way we can.  If you’re traveling to our area again soon, don’t hesitate to call us.

Summary: It is a very nice and cozy hotel..it's very closed to disneyland so the hotel decoration and mood is like you are in disneyland!!! Picturesque place, very nice gardens...very big hotel..the most of the staff is wearing a hero from disneyland..good for kids..the breakfast is good but needs some more stuff i think..it's full of sweets and there is no some bread or cheese..the rooms are big but old..they have to do a rennovation in rooms..the other place is fantastic!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: My family stayed here Labor Day weekend, and although we booked 2 rooms at separate times they were able to accommodate us and make sure we had adjoining rooms. The rooms were HUGE. The only complaints we had were the bathroom/shower being too small; and the pillows were too small.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary Heading: Great location, beautiful grounds, had a few problems
Summary: Overall the location of the hotel as perfect. There is a short walk to Disneyland but a shuttle is also provided. The grounds are beautiful and there is plenty of seating to be able to relax. The problems I had were I requested blankets that were never given to me, the TV didn't work, the headboards of the bed looked like a cat had scratched all over them, and the bellman carts were old and falling apart. Simple things that effect someone's stay. They did comp my parking for the problems which I did appreciate.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for choosing our hotel.  I’m happy that you enjoyed your stay and I’m looking forward to having you again as a guest in our hotel.

Summary: Fair to say that this was probably the low point in our hotels on our SF to LA road trip! I mean it was ok as somewhere to lay your head and in general staff were helpful, but there were a few to many downsides:- 1. Our room was away from the main block and was dated and in a bit of disrepair. The air con obviously leaked, which meant the carpet was damp and there was a slight damp odour, and there were a number of light bulbs missing. 2. Breakfast was a bit pricey. 3. The reception staff appeared a little frosty. 4. Very long queues for the Disney Shuttles meaning nearly an hour's wait - unexpected!
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear that your stay at the hotel was not up to par.  Please not that this information has been passed on to our concerned staff.  Despite this, we hope to be able to welcome you back on a return visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We had a great time at this hotel... Staff, rooms, location were fantastic! The shuttle to Disney parks were fast and always on time.  It was great to have a location so close to everything. Can't wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Right across the street from Disney and Friends parking lot
Summary: Very accommodating staff, upgraded our room upon arrival, seeing that my daughter had a hard time walking. The room was very clean, beds were comfortable. The cafe is very good. Best steak I've ever eaten. The breakfast buffet was also above average. Perfect location to Disneyland. The bathroom is small (One person at a time) and no outside the bathroom vanity. TV programming was ok. AC was a bit difficult to operate and just when the room was cool enough for covers, it would go off and heat up again instantly. Spent the night covering up, then tossing off all the covers, covering up, etc., etc. Maybe I wasn't operating it right. Overall good experience for last minute stay. I would go there again just for the steak.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for choosing our hotel.  I’m happy that you enjoyed your stay and I’m looking forward to having you again as a guest in our hotel.

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay here for 3 nights. The staff were friendly, rooms were clean and comfortable. Our air conditioning unit was noisy even when switched off but we were moved rooms straight away with no fuss. Free shuttle to Disney was excellent with super friendly drivers. We used this to have a break from Disney late afternoon and made the most of the happy hour in the hotel, better value than the parks. We also enjoyed the buffet breakfast at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary: An average old-styled hotel with a small fun pool. Car parking's entry and exit is tricky due to awkward card swiping machine at the entrance. However, the hotel to Disney shuttle is very convenient and runs till 1:15AM.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for choosing our hotel.  I’m happy that you enjoyed your stay and I’m looking forward to having you again as a guest in our hotel.

Summary Heading: Reasonably priced hotel for visiting Disneyland
Summary: I spent 5 nights here with family, and rate this hotel pretty good given the very reasonable prices they offer.  Rooms are spacious, clean and beds are comfortable.  The buildings and surroundings are pleasant, especially good was the shuttle bus to and from Disney which was regular, and very friendly serviced. I found the food fairly mediocre - breakfast was overpriced and not a spectacular buffet.  And lunch and dinners were not very good. I booked this as a VIP+ Expedia hotel, but got no recognition of that during check-in and no special amenity as promised by Expedia. When i asked, reception had no clue they were VIP+.  This certainly needs follow up.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary Heading: Perfect Stay For Our Disney Vacation!
Summary: After doing some research, I found that part of the hotel had been renovated.  At check in I asked if our room was in the renovated section, we found that it was not.  Our check in clerk asked if I wanted to be in one of those rooms and made the change instantly.  The room was wonderful, large, with obvious touches from the renovation.  All the staff we encountered were friendly, personable, and willing to help in any way.  The shuttle service is second to none - the only negative is that the large shuttle is not air conditioned.  We enjoyed the pool area with the many choices of seating from cabanas to lounge chairs to the typical umbrella-shaded table and chairs.  We stayed 5 nights and enjoyed every minute. This is our new go-to hotel for our Disney stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.  Call us if there is anything we can help you with.

Summary: We have been visiting Disneyland for 20 years and have stayed in nearly every hotel in the area, what a pleasant surprise to finally find this gem.  I can say with certainty that we have found our "go to" hotel for Disneyland.   Being honest, it is really a crap shoot when picking a hotel in the Disney area. Most of the hotels have been present for nearly 60 years.  Most have had exterior facelifts, but you never know what is going to greet you once you open the door to your room.  We were pleasantly surprised when we opened the door to our very large room.  We had an updated room, comfortable beds, great pillows and nice linens.  The bathroom was older and could use a fan, but that was our only suggestion for our room.  We loved that the rooms were completely quiet, you never
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Excellent service, the rooms are large, outside facilities gorgeous, great food and service and the shuttle was always on time. The restaurants serves food to 11 pm and the prices were very reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating and for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  I’m sure our entire hotel staff enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Perfectly comforting after a big day at Disney
Summary: Loved your hotel.. clean and very generous sized rooms.. friendly helpful staff.. easy no fuss shuttle service to Disneyland. Yummy affordable buffet breakfast..  Thankyou Majestic garden for a comfortable friendly no fuss stay..will definitely recommend to our friends
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.  Call us if there is anything we can help you with.

Summary Heading: Awesome Castle Theme, great for kids, friendly staff, easy shuttle
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights from 8-19 through 8-23, for a visit to Disneyland.  The staff was very friendly and catered to whatever we needed.  We took the free shuttle to Disneyland, which was always on time, and often early.  We also walked a couple of times, which took approximately 20 minutes, with sidewalk the whole way, ending at Downtown Disney.  We used a crib, provided by the hotel, which was very nice, and needed for our toddler.  Rooms were nice and clean, and staff would always ask us if we needed anything else.  Will always consider this when coming to Disney.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that you will recommend us to a friend.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: This hotel was beautiful. I am surprised I have never stayed here with all the trips to Disney we have made. Access to,the upstairs rooms is not easy unless you are close to elevators which are scarce. Nice for families with the one bedroom. Worst part is yes this is closest to Disney, but no shuttle and still a pretty long walk. You have to walk a very long sidewalk then through the wilderness lodge and span the parking lots. There is a city shuttle but felt a little sketchy.  Cab ride was $6.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am not sure if you are reviewing the right hotel as we offer a free hotel only shuttle service to Disneyland. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Comfortable clean rooms, free transport to Disneyland
Summary: I took a break and visited Disneyland on my own. This hotel was highly recommended by friends. The room was comfortable, clean and quiet. Staff at the registration desk were friendly and efficient. The free transportation to Disneyland was a nice full size bus. I enjoyed breakfast in the on-site restaurant (not included). They had a good selection in the buffet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: The property is updating their rooms and had about 1/3 done when we were there.  We had 3 rooms so saw both versions and though the updated rooms are improved the older rooms were fine, clean and beds very comfortable.  The shuttle service was great, the staff accommodating, and the property lovely with nooks, fireplaces, and gardens. The only negative was a slightly overpriced breakfast buffet. The nightly fireworks overhead were delightful.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that you will recommend us to a friend.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Friendly hotel only a short ride from Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Majestic Garden hotel for 7 days in July 2016. The room was spacious and well kept. Whilst not the most modern of rooms it was perfectly adequate and comfortable. The staff were great, particularly Glenn who was very helpful and friendly. I had read reviews before I left about the shuttle bus being a problem, however we found it to be excellent. As long as you were there at the bus time, you would be taken even if you had to wait a short while. The bus drivers were great and full of helpful tips, particularly Roger who told us the best times to go and how to keep track of the queues. The shuttle also collected from Disneyland up to 1.15am which gave you lots of time to get back after the park had closed.The hotel itself was good and the restaurant food was nice.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your business and your trust in us.  I am very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Stayed here with my 14yr old and husband on arrival the staff were so helpful and friendly. Our room was a little dated but fantastic size 2 big beds and lounge area whole place was spotless. The bar staff are wonderful so friendly and happy hour early evening was great, nice little pool area to relax in. The bus service to disney is amazing think its every half hour so you can split your day at the parks we came home showered and went back. The food in the restaurant was delicious my son had meatballs and pasta he said it was the best he had eaten.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone it might be a bit dated in places (there are plans to refurbish) but its very clean, beds are comfy and the staff are great  especially the bar staff. Big thank you for a great stay
Manager Response: We appreciate your positive feedback about our hotel.  We do take price in catering to our guests’ needs the best way we can.  If you’re traveling to our area again soon, don’t hesitate to stay with us again!

Summary: Whilst this is a great hotel and location for Disneyland, it should not be overlooked if wanting a comfortable, quiet hotel in the Anaheim area. We were not visiting Disneyland on this occasion but found this to be an ideal base for a few days before heading off on a tour. While there are no restaurants within walking distance we found the hotel restaurant to offer very acceptable meals at reasonable pricing. If staying in the Anaheim area again this hotel would be top of my list
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary: My partner and I stayed here last week as part as a 4 week trip around the states. We couldn't afford Disney land but we're certainly not disappointed by the majestic garden hotel! It's literally a stone throw away from Disney, free shuttle to and from Disney every half hour and the staff were actually so helpful (I'm all for nit-picking when it comes to hotel reviews, but this place was actually fantastic) princess Corinne lives in the castle and visits the kids as they walk into the lobby. It was lovely. Happy families, happy couples and happy guests. The restaurant was basic, but enough, and they catered for my allergies which was an added suprise. Could see the fireworks from our room and for what we paid we would go back in a heartbeat. - only tip would be that one day is
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that you will recommend us to a friend.  We hope to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Wow! Perfect Castle for our First Trip To DisneyLand
Summary: It was right around the corner from Disney and it really was a Majestic Castle! Such incredibly spacious accomodations, great food, awesome concierge, beautiful place throughout. Even the hallways were decorated in the knights/princess themes. Just such a wonderful hotel! WE WILL BE BACK!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review from your recent stay here with us. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here. We hope you'll share this good news with friends and family and come back and see us again soon. Thank you!

Summary: This was an awesome pick to stay at.  The hotel rooms were nice size but a little dirty.  We stayed in a pet friendly room so that might be the reason.  If you need ice you have to search because there isn't one on every floor.  The pool was nice.  It would've been nice if laundry was free since it's kind of expensive.  Took five minutes to get to Disney!  Shuttle runs every 30 mins.  You can see the fireworks every night from out front.  Will definitely stay here again when we visit Disneyland in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback from your stay, we are happy that you enjoyed your time here with us. I will share your concerns with the rest of the management team here for review and we hope to have you back as a guest again soon. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great Location and Awesome Pool Area
Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay for location and for the shuttle service it offers.  Shuttle service is very reliable!  The gardens and the pool and outside terrace are beautiful.  We loved the pool and cabana huts that were available.  There is also pool-side service that is available so you can truly spend the day by the pool!  It appears that the hotel is being redone.  Carpets in the halls are all redone and have a magical castle-like feel.  While our room was ample in space and our beds were comfy and newer, the room's carpet and wallpaper and bathrooms could use an update.  There are updated rooms available that I suppose you could request.  If you have small children who sleep before the Disney fireworks go off, the fireworks are close and can be quite loud...but they
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope you'll share your memories with friends and family. Come back and see us soon! Thank you!

Summary: Bed was extremely hard, shuttle to Disneyland had no Ac, elevator permit expired in 2015, no microwave in room, bathroom tiny, no sink or prep area outside of bathroom. Charge $14 a day to park you vehicle is ridiculous when renting a room in my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback, I will share with the department managers for their review and follow up. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Two nights at start of Western Discovery tour
Summary: Staff were very friendly and helpful at reception and check in was hassle free. We had arrived after a long flight from UK to LAX and had had difficulty getting transport out to the hotel. Eventually took a Super Shuttle costing $17 each and 45 minute journey at night. Learnt later from other passengers on the tour that there is a free shuttle to Disneyland from LAX and then a short trip from there to hotel that they had been advised to use. Security card keys are used here and there are several sections to the hotel so you need to keep your cards with you or you get locked out of hotel!! Room huge with two double beds and four big fluffy pillows. Coffeemaker, armchair and table. The one negative was the shower/bath didn't drain and you ended up with bath half full after quick
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Not to bad $14 daily to park but they have shuttle busses to Disneyland unfortunately after a hot day at the park busses had no ac thank goodness it was a short ride. The bar had good food a little pricey but ok bartender's were nice. No security in building P sliding doors open all night.  Overall not bad room was nice but would request different building next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and thank you for providing this helpful feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Anaheim Majestic Gardens made us feel like Royalty!
Summary: We were upgraded upon check in to a suite, and it was our 20th wedding anniversary so that was an amazing experience!  The hotel itself, common areas and pool were clean, inviting and comfortable.  I loved the touches in the rooms and we were very pleased! I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Disneyland area.  The shuttles were also reliable and fast to get us back and forth as well as free!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Incredibly inefficient and rude reception service. Ridiculous.  The biggest joke was when a loud guy named Bruno came by shouting that everything is ok and that he is part of the management at the hotel and everything is fine.  Bruno himself was loud, rude, unhelpful and annoying.  If Bruno is management the no wonder that's the service.

Front desk personnel very friendly. One shuttle driver to Disneyland very helpful, another one rude at himself being late. Pay a lot of money for Disney. Do not need driver with attitude. Was able to have laptops put in manager safe. Location ideal for getting to Disney quickly - also with Uber.  Would go to property again. Fireworks shot off right next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Amazing. Amazing.  Very nice. Very comfortable. Love this hotel. Room was awesome and my daughter said she felt like she was in a castle.  Staff is amazing.  Can't say amazing enough. Will never anywhere in Anaheim again.  Shuttle was always on time and drivers were ready to answer questions and give advice.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave this feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel very soon.

Summary Heading: I wish I had stayed here sooner!
Summary: I kept seeing great reviews, but put it off for other hotels that were closer within walking distance or had a better/comparable rate.  I finally gave this one a chance, and so glad I did.    The staff was amazing and friendly, housekeeping was thorough.  the rooms were clean and spacious, and the beds were some of the most comfortable I'd ever slept in.  Even my husband, the insomniac, got the best rest ever. Also QUIET...more importantly.  We usually get stuck with loud neighbors everywhere we stay, and the only thing we heard from the other rooms was water running occasionally, and even then it was only audible from the bathroom.    We checked out their happy hour in the restaurant, the appetizers were delicious, and good drinks too!  It's nice that they have some quiet
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: The photos online the rooms look nice. Upon arrival, the so called security door, where you have to use your room key to gain access did not work, the maintenance staff was able to open the door by hand. Totally unacceptable!! The room had a musky stale smell, the carpet was dirty and moist. The shower had minimal pressure which getting clean became difficult.The next day we requested another room, The desk staff appeared a bit annoyed when we had discussed our concerns. The new room appeared slightly better, however when using the shower the drain was plugged and began to fill the tub. Definitely not majestic! Minimal carts to take luggage to rooms, frustrating time spent. The only great thing was watching the fireworks outside by the flag pole.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and providing this feedback from your stay with us. We will share your concerns with the rest of the management for resolution. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great off-property hotel and an even better price!
Summary: We stayed here on a recent trip to Disneyland and have already booked another reservation for next week when we return to DL!  This hotel is great- located very convenient off Interstate 5 and right at the entrance to the Disney parking structures.  They provide a shuttle to and from Disneyland before the park opens and runs throughout the day until well after the parks close!  It was a lifesaver after a LONG day of walking in the parks! The hotel itself is very clean and the rooms are some of the more spacious rooms we've ever stayed in!  Very updated and comfortable- you'll think you're sleeping in a luxury hotel- except the price is just right for almost ANY budget! The staff is incredible at the front desk, and in fact I had left my cell charger in our room after checkout,

Well located large resort. Rooms are large and clean. Close to Disney with a great free shuttle that runs all day. Pool is good to have in summer. Service is ok. Restaurant is pretty average, just basic bland family food.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback from your recent stay with us. We appreciate you providing this information. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Not our first stay here and it will not be our last stay either.
Summary: So easy to get to and from Disneyland with their free shuttle.  The best part is, the shuttle is for THIS hotel only so you are making stops along the way, and it also has one of the latest pick up times so you can get every last ride in. I highly recommend watching the fireworks from the hotel parking lot at least one night.  It is great to see them from inside the park with the music that goes along with them, but from the hotel parking lot they are AMAZING, but be aware it is very loud, it's funny to hear the car alarms go off as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your time here with us. We appreciate this feedback and hope you will return again soon to be our guest. Thank you!

Summary: Stayed here after staying at the Grand Californian and I actually liked this hotel better. The room was really spacious and the shuttle ran right on time. The grounds of the hotel were amazing. We loved the koi pond. I wish we stayed longer to take advantage of the game room. Hope to stay there again.
Manager Response: thank you for your review of your recent stay here with us. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have you again as a guest. thank you!

Summary: Stayed here for a night during a SoCal road trip. Michelle checked us in and she was absolutely wonderful..very friendly, knowledgable and professional. When we got to the room my room mate immediately discovered dirty towels in the bathroom with hair wedged in between them. Next, she discovered a spot on her bed. It was such a hassle trying to call someone as the phone just rang and rang and rang to no avail. Before leaving for DTDisney we noticed the front desk and were assured it would be corrected when we return. Sure enough, nothing was rectified when we got back. I took it upon myself to go to the desk (again, no one answers the phone) and I was once again assured that it would be fixed. After all this, I have to say that the whole entire experience was forgiven due to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feed back. I have shared your comments with the mangers of the two employees whom you mentioned in your review. They will be happy to hear of your compliments. Thank you

Summary Heading: Nice place close to park, great for littles.
Summary: We liked our room, specifically when we switched to the castle bunk bed rooms. My 5 year old liked the proximity to the park, the shuttle, and Princess Corinne. The food options are great with the small convenience type store, but hotel food itself is just average. The pool was nice, albeit a bit crowed and the Koi fish pond and Gazebo also a nice touch. The only complaints we had were the size of the bathrooms, which are very very small, and the vent located right above the children's bunk bed, making the top bunk too cold for sleeping. I mean REALLY cold if you don't want to be hot elsewhere in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate your feedback and I will share with maintenence about the placement of the bunk beds. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a visit to Disneyland!
Summary: I was initially worried about having to rely on shuttle service to get to and from Disneyland, but my worries were unfounded. The shuttle service was very reliable and the drivers gave us some great tips about the parks! The room was perfect for my family of 4 - it was spacious and had everything we needed. The pool area was great, with a couple of cabanas to relax in, a snack bar and poolside food service. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are pleased that  you enjoyed your time here with us. We look forward to your return, hopefully very soon. Thank you!

Summary: typical Disney type hotel. Rooms clean plenty of space for 3 people. Did not have time to use facilities as only there one night then on start of tour next morning. Pleasant and courteous staff. Good breakfast  to start day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the time spent here with us, we appreciate your feed back!

Summary: We choose this hotel due to its location to Disneyland, but it an hours drive toUniversl studios, so you need to plan your activities as LA traffic is horrendous. The location is great and the rooms spacious. Unfortunately Yu only spend 6 hours a day at the facility when young are sleeping as you need to make early next starts and return at midnight. The shuttle buses on the return trip are too infrequent. It would have been quicker to catch a taxi as the queue for the busses was so long that it took 3 busses trips before we were picked up and there was dozens behind us. We were going to get room service cereral at 6am but room service said no, so we went to the restaurant=t where we were told it was a buffet. We were charged $50 for 3 Bowles of cereral, so we never returned as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, your comments will be shared with the management teams of these department to rectify these issues. Thank you!

Summary: This hotel is great for families that want to experience Disneyland. A great location with Free shuttle service. We are a family of 5 and we had a double room with a roll away bed, the room was big enough to handle all of us. Rooms were clean and comfortable, and staff are very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: I appreciate your positive feedback about our hotel.  We do take price in catering to our guests’ needs the best way we can.  If you’re traveling to our area again soon, don’t hesitate to call us.

Summary: There's nothing particularly wrong with this hotel. The rooms are a little bit small and plain but you'll barely spend any time in them if you're going to be at Disneyland. The staff were nice enough but nothing particularly special. The castle feel is nice and maybe with more time and younger kids we would have enjoyed it more. The shuttle runs every half hour and is quite good. But beware if your coming back after the night time fire works then you will be waiting for a while. It's not too far to walk so we just walked home instead of waiting and would have made it back quicker. Overall it's a nice hotel and was good enough for what we needed as we spent the whole time at Disneyland but there's nothing overly special about it. Not badly priced though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am very pleased to hear that your staff made your stay pleasant.  Do checkout our Facebook and Twitter pages for promos that you might be interest in.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: My family.and I stayed here for 3 nights 4 days. A Thursday- Sunday. The hotel was great. We had a deluxe room, it had been renovated recently and was very nice. Very spacious, clean and welcoming. The forest wallpaper was serene and helped the room seem calming. The carpet was nice and plush which was great for our 2 yearold who wanted to play on the floor. The grounds are beautiful and free shuttle was convenient. Breakfast was tasty. We ordered dinner through room service one night and although it was fast the food left a little something to be desired. Book through their website for the best specials. We've already booked another stay for september!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating and for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  I’m sure our entire hotel staff enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay.  Take care!

Summary: This was a great place to stay.  The food in the restaurant was great, the staff was so helpful and kind.  Our back door opened right to the pool.  Quiet at night. They have a shuttle that runs to Disneyland every 30 mins. The room was spacious and plenty of space for the kids to play with their toys. This will be our hotel of choice when down in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating and for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  I’m sure our entire hotel staff enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay.  Take care!

Summary: The breakfast included in the room rate was great.  Close proximity and convenient shuttle service to Disney.  Property was clean and comfortable.  The weather was very hot outside, so the A/C in our room had trouble keeping the room cool.  Room service and the deli in the lobby were both very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary Heading: Good option to visit Disney parks
Summary: Good place! Clean and the people who work there are very helpful. There's a Disney's ticket module where you can buy tickets. The best part is the shuttle service to the Disney parks, every 15 minutes and every 45.  They gave me an upgrade so the pool was just in front of my room, the pool area sit amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Staying here completed the magic of our Disneyland trip!
Summary: We stayed in the Castle Bunk Bed room July 20-24 2016. The kids absolutely loved the bunk bed, we all took pictures and posed by the bed! And that was only the start of our trip! The rooms are very spacious--they're not kidding! The rest of the hotel does give the castle feel, from the pictures of knights in shining armor, castles and dragons and fairy tale of the dragon on the wall and carpet. Very cool.   Another great perk is we could purchase our Disneyland hopper pass at the hotel and felt ready the night before. The shuttle is so convenient, the drivers were so nice and helpful and went out of there way when the shuttle for full--they immediately pulled up another one for us. The first night we watched the Disneyland fireworks from the parking lot and they were amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating and for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  I’m sure our entire hotel staff enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We stayed here with 2 kids and would stay here again. We stayed in one of the renovated rooms and it was nice. Spacious, clean, and comfortable beds. Our back door in the room led out to the pool. The pool was nice and served food and drinks out there. Shuttle to Disneyland was every 30 mins and right outside hotel. Very convienent. Hotel is right down the street from Disneyland and you can see fireworks from hotel.  Definitely recommend hotel! Staff was nice check in was easy. They do charge for car nightly though like most hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary: Overall a nice hotel with huge rooms. They offer an awesome military discount on their rooms. Staff was very friendly and really tried their best to accommodate our disabled son. The rooms were clean and the grounds were very nicely manicured.  The Disney shuttle was always on time and the drivers extremely friendly. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: Checked in today and inquired about an upgrade, only to be notified that they are "sold" out. The room they gave has stains all over the couch. Can't see outside the window because it's dirty. There is a yucky smell in the room. Will never stay here again!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  I am very sorry to hear that your stay at the hotel was not up to par.  Please not that this information has been passed on to our concerned staff.  Despite this, we hope to be able to welcome you back on a return visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful, they have a shuttle to take you back and forth to Disneyland Parks every 30 minutes. The drivers share knowledge on how to get to ride the most rides.   Got to enjoy the spa and pool, middle of July so there were a lot of guests using the facility. Everyone was friendly and welcoming. They have a bar that will serve you alcoholic drinks by the pool.  Overall had a great experience, would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback from your recent stay here with us. We appreciate you takling the time to share for others to see.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and great shuttle service to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Majestic Garden Hotel for three days and two nights during our family trip to Disneyland. The hotel was clean, the rooms were nice, and the shuttle service absolutely made our trips to Disneyland stress free. Because we spent most of our time at Disneyland, I can't comment too much about the hotel itself; although, we don't have any complaints. However, I can honestly say that the shuttle service to and from Disneyland was top-notch. I would recommend anyone stay here for nothing less than a free and stress free shuttle service to the park. Runs every 30 minutes, is on time, and gets you to the park and back to the hotel very quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback here from your recent stay. We are so pleased that you enjoyed the hotel, especially our Free dedicated shuttle service to Disney. We are pretty proud of this unique service as well. Please share with your friends and family and come back and see us again soon.

Summary: Very nice and clean property located close to Disneyland...Kimberly at the front desk was very professional, polite and helpful. Their shuttle rides straight to and from Disneyland with no stops in between. Very Cool Place and I have already booked our next stay ;)
Manager Response: Thanks for your positive review of your time here with us. I will pass along your compliment of Kimberly at the Front Desk. We hope you'll be back to stay with us again here very soon!!

Summary: Good overall! We stayed there a week in June for the location to the park! My wife and I and our 2 year old daughter. Good happy hour, drinks and pub food! Clean room and helpful staff! We liked the little deli but wish they had a bigger selection of menu items. Cons, hard to find a trolley to help transport your bags to your room!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great Choice for a Hotel Near Disneyland!
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for one night for a short trip to Disneyland.  The location is very close to the park and the hotel runs a free shuttle, which is a very nice perk.  Our room was clean, the bed was comfortable, and there was a coffee pot in the room.  The staff was friendly and took good care of us.  We were only there for a night, so we didn't get to see any of the other amenities (pool, restaurant, etc.), but we would definitely consider staying here again for our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for choosing our hotel.  I’m happy that you enjoyed your stay and I’m looking forward to having you again as a guest in our hotel.

Summary: I have stayed at this property numerous times.  The rooms are very large and spacious.  Great for families with kids. If you get a queen room you could easily have a roll away bed and sleep 5 comfortably. Rooms have been newly renovated and are very nice. The shuttle is very convenient to Disneyland.
Manager Response: I appreciate your positive feedback about our hotel.  We do take price in catering to our guests’ needs the best way we can.  If you’re traveling to our area again soon, don’t hesitate to stay  with us.

Summary: As Disneyland Annual Pass Holders I was delighted this hotel offered a nice discount which honestly prompted us to book here. We have stayed at over ten hotels around Disneyland and never stayed here before. Our room was really nice! Spacious, nicely decorated, clean and the a/c worked great. Which for summer in Anaheim is a must! The hotel was far more convenient than I thought. I always avoided it since it was on the "other side" of the park. It really worked out much better than being on Harbor or Katella. We drove back and forth so I can't offer anything about shuttle service to Disneyland. The restaurant was a little disappointing, as was room service. I think I would likely skip eating here. This will probably be our go to hotel in the future for our Disneyland stays. Our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am very pleased to hear that your staff made your stay pleasant.  Do checkout our Facebook and Twitter pages for promos that you might be interest in.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Large rooms and convenient to parks
Summary: Our family of four stayed here and now that we have teenagers this hotel is perfect for us.  The rooms are huge which gave us plenty of room to move around. The shuttle runs like clockwork but you do have to get there 5-10 min before departure time because folks line up.  The rooms were refurbished recently and ours was clean and not worn at all.  Nice pool, meh deli and I did not try the full breakfast/restaurant/bar on site.  on our first night we did not go to Disneyland but got a GREAT view of the fireworks from the hotel parking lot!  Notes on the shuttle: I use an ecv and the shuttles had lifts and worked great for me.  There is one shuttle without a lift so they ask that you tell them about 30 minutes in advance if you need a ride.  Most of the time I just chanced it and
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: My family and i spent 4 days at this hotel on a visit to LA. The room was great, very clean and the hotel is very nice. Its a perfect choice for those going to disneyland. Its like 5 mins away from the park with shuttle busses all day long. It is far from LA if you want to go to santa monica or hollywood it would take around an hour drive and there's traffic too. I would recommend it if your stay is about the disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review, we are so pleased that you enjoyed your time with us and hope you'll come back again soon!

Summary: This place is a joke.  Horrible service in an old Sheraton hotel.  Their shuttle don't run on time and are too small to accommodate pick up people from the park, leaving people stranded there for over an hour...really?  They have no idea about how to provide service or communicate with guests here.
Manager Response: Sorry that your stay didn't meet with your expectations. We appreciate you providing this feedback for us to learn from. I will share your concerns with the management team, especially your concerns about our free shuttle service. Thank you!

Summary: Very convenient location. On & off the freeway. Excellent shuttle service to & from Disneyland that runs every half hour. This hotel also has a restaurant and a store that sells small trinkets, personal items, snacks, sandwiches, donuts and coffee in the morning. The room we had was large (2 queens) and was nicely decorated and clean. Lots of parking space. We will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  I hope your next stay is just around the corner.

Summary Heading: Staying here to go to Disney.
Summary: Husband, son, and I stayed here.  It was amazing.  We loved the security. Lots of parking.  Nicely decorated. Our room was spacious and had refrigerator and coffee service. The beds were comfortable. We heard the fireworks from Disney but did not hear any noise from other guests. The shuttle service was awesome!  When one shuttle filled up, they immediately got another shuttle.  They were always on time. Drivers were so polite. Customer service was terrific. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: I've been wanting to stay here for the longest time so decided to book my room. We checked into our room around 4:30. Our room was in the adjoining building that seemed a bit older or run down. Walked into our room and noticed it had a musty smell. I thought it may have been just stuffy in there so we flicked on the AC and went over to Disney. BTW they have a free shuttle but we had just missed it and the next one was arriving in 30 mins so we drove, having an annual pass we don't pay for parking. Returned to our room at midnight to a horrific smell of sewer or sulfur mixed with cigarettes. Our room was at the very end of the hall and we thought maybe we were by the septic so I called the front desk and relayed our room stunk. The night manager was very nice and friendly and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am glad to hear that overall your experience was positive.  I am disappointed to hear that our housekeeping staff didn’t meet your expectations.  This critical feedback will be used in training our staff.  Thank you and look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: The bed was AMAZING! Great comforter, big pillows, and very comfy. The only thing I would change is to have a microwave in the room. Other than that it was a great stay. The free shuttle to and from Disney was also a very huge plus.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: I love this hotel, the food is delish. The rooms are beautiful and large like being in a elegant castle. The fireworks are beautiful almost right above the hotel. The food is good but you pay a lot for small portion. Washing machine on premises. its a wonderful lay out. very relaxing. I hope I get to go back one day.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: We have stayed here several times. Most of the hotel has been recently renovated. The service is great. Love the grounds. The location is so convenient with their shuttle service. On our Friday night there coming back from Disneyland, there was a line for the shuttle. We didn't all fit, but instead of making us wait until the next shuttle 30 min. later, they sent 2 more shuttles right in a row to ensure we all got back as quickly as possible. The Disneyland fireworks can be seen better from the hotel than at Disneyland!!!! We will definitely be back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights over the 4th of July weekend. For the most part it was OK, but on the last day we were robbed by one of the maids. They stole money from our wallet and really ruined our vacation. The management was apologetic, but made no effort to make things right. We won't be staying here in the future, nor will we recommend it to others.
Manager Response: We take these claims very seriously and safety and the well being of our guests is first priority. The hotel launched internal investigation of with the findings were none.  Guest was provided local police information to file a formal report which the hotel would completely comply with; however at this time we are not aware of any police report filed by this guest.

Summary: We took our girls here when they were 6 & 7. Either we have moved on in the past 12 years or this hotel needs staff training. Tried the restaurant and they were not happy with the $14 tip on an $88.00 bill before tax. We know this because the man on the till then walked up to the bar and said that we were Nada? What's that? French for not happy with my lot. To be fair we come from a country where tips are rare and only for great service and not mediocre plate slapping from people that don't get paid properly.  Sad really eh for one of the most influential nations on the earth.

I did not have hot water for two days. I had to take a shower in another room down the hall. This was totally unexceptable. The hotel eventually did fix the issue. I asked at the front desk for compensation for this and I was told to call management. Compensation should of been offered without me asking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have sent your feedback to the personnel concerned.  I apologize for this bad experience.   This is very disappointing to hear, but we hope you give us another chance to make it up to you

Summary: For less than $200 a night including the parking fee and taxes we ended up with a beautiful Turret suite and free breakfast.  Our stay at the Majestic could not have been any easier or enjoyable! I do not know if it was due to booking through tripadvisor, or because it was just the last available room for my family since we rolled in some time around midnight, or maybe it was just pure luck!  The front desk woman was still so friendly and helpful at that hour. I had stayed at this property 8 or 9 years ago when it was the Sheraton and I liked it then. There seemed to be the same extremely comfortable beds and huge rooms.  Due to it being a suite I was happy to have a larger bathroom.  We loved the corner tub.  The only suggestion I have would be for them to put a light in the
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect rating and for recommending our hotel to other travelers.  I’m sure our entire hotel staff enjoyed catering to your needs as much as you enjoyed your stay.  Come back and see us again soon!!

Summary Heading: Makes you wonder how they operate
Summary: This is the second time we stayed in this hotel and let me tell you I will be the last! We stayed here last summer with minimal issues during their transition from one ownership group to another well what a difference a year makes. Upon arrival we were told our room wasn't ready for our 3 o' clock check in (this was at 2:45) and we were told since we were inconvenienced we would get a free upgrade and have our parking fee (which on a side note is just ridiculous to pay for hotel parking after you already pay to stay there) waived and that they would text us in 20 minutes when our room was ready. So we thought okay we'll grab some food and wait. An hour goes by and my son is getting restless after the drive from Texas so we decide to head back to the hotel. Well in the span of 45

We selected this hotel based on reviews and location and we scored! Great service. Free transportation to and from Disneyland. Very close to DL. The hotel room was very clean. Its a little outdated in a few areas but its kept up very nice! The price was great compared to other hotels in the area. Will definitely stay here again when we come back to visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future

Summary: I spent three days at the Anaheim Majestic Hotel for a convention.  The room was excellent and customer service was superb all the way around.  I was surprised how well prepared and tasty all the banquet meals were.  I highly recommend this hotel that is right next door to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your conference. I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future

Summary: This place is great. Clean nice rooms great price. Great staff. Nice little deli and game room. Good inexpensive dining on site and private shuttle. Love it here can't wait to get back. Nice bar too and pool and spa. Oh it's just great  this is our second stay won't be our last
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and I am glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future

Summary Heading: Great location for visiting Disney Land and DCA
Summary: Room had a "majestic theme" which puts you in the mood to go to Disney Land.  Shuttle to and from Disney Land very helpful.  Hotel store/cafe sold bagels, pastries, cereal, coffee, oatmeal, etc. at a reasonable price so that we didn't have to eat in the hotel restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  I am very pleased to hear that your staff made your stay pleasant.  Do checkout our Facebook and Twitter pages for promos that you might be interest in.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Not impressed with this hotel for the price.  Carpets in hallways need attention, very old either need stretching or cleaning.  The lobby was the only nice part of this hotel. For being seniors they placed us to the furthest building from the shuttle.  Asked if we could move they said to ck next day nothing was ever available.  will never recommend the hotel
Manager Response: I am very disappointed to hear that you found our service to be below your standards.  We would like to know more.  Please email us with a phone number or email address so our Hotel Manager can discuss your issues personally.

Summary: This hotel is terrible! From check in, to the rooms/environment, the transportation to and from the hotel/ theme parks, and especially the staff! All the way up to the head manager, the staff are very low class/ ghetto type people. I deal with the public for a living and know how to handle things/people, but this experience was like being in the twilight zone! They made me feel like I was crazy to complain about paying for a room that I didn't receive because their webmaster placed the wrong pics for the room in which I made a reservation for. They complained "again!" When I called them for the 3rd time at 3 in the morning because teenagers were hanging out, smoking and cursing in the hallway by our room. The carpet was ruffling all down the hallway from the elevator to our room
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you weren’t satisfied with the competence of our front desk team.  Please email us with a phone number or email address so our Front Desk Manager can discuss your issues personally.

Summary: The lobby and common areas of the hotel are very nice.  The hallways are pretty cool and have a storybook flair.  The double queen room we rented was just okay.  Not a ton of room, but okay.  The bathroom was tiny.  In order to sit on the toilet, you had to maneuver yourself into the bathroom and squeeze behind the door.  And then the toilet paper was in an awkward spot.  Often times I just used the kleenex on the counter.  The room itself is fairly modern, but my particular room had liquid stains on the carpet in front of the mini-fridge.  It wasn't very pleasant looking.  And there was no microwave.  It would have come in handy to warm up the pizza I had delivered to my room.  Speaking of food, I didn't try the restaurant in the hotel, but there is a small deli that has some
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with such detailed feedback about your stay. I am very sorry to hear that several things throughout your stay did not meet your expectations. Please note that your concerns have been passed on to our housekeeping management. We do hope you give us another chance as we will definitely improve services.

Summary: We stayed here 5 days. Overall this place was very nice.  Pros - Location. This place is very close to Disneyland and the freeway. It also has the best view of the fireworks. Even better the dland itself - Pool and decent size convenient store. The store was a bit pricey, but it was very nice to get muffins, toiletries, drinks, etc in the hotel. The pool also had a bar which was nice. - The shuttle. This was the best benefit in my opinion. The shuttle bus drivers were amazing, and helpful. The shuttle runs every half hour. It was great to take the kids to dland in the morning, jump on the shuttle for naps, and head back.  - Rooms. The rooms were average to large with comfortable linens and pillows. The age of the rooms are starting to show, but it was decent enough.  - Parking -
