Summary: The hotel was okay.  The carpet leading up to the room was very old looking.  You had to pay extra for WiFi and for Parking.  That is gouging.  Should have just booked a room at a smaller hotel/motel that would have provided WiFi, free Parking and a little fridge and microwave.  Next time!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and yes the hallway carpet is looking tired however we are under renovation and beginning April 20th we are replacing the carpet and wall coverings in the halls. The rooms do have a refrigerator however no microwave. As for parking, the majority of the resort hotels charge and we are on the lower side. we are one of the very few properties that offer a complimentary shuttle to and from the park every 30 minutes so you do not need to pay for parking at Disney. Thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: My new go to Disney Hotel
Summary: This was a great Hotel. Nice rooms, clean facilities, and prompt shuttle service to and from Disneyland. The restaurant was good, and the nice quiet bar was appreciated after a long day in the park. The concierge service was out standing. Those guys took such good care of us both coming and going.
Manager Response: What can I say other than thank you very much for the very kind review and 5 star rating. I am happy that the hotel met your expectations and that you had an enjoyable time. I will share your review with our staff. Thank you again.

Summary: Walls and ceilings are paper thin. You can hear every kid running around.   Old, very old carpeting and elevators.   They warn you about the fireworks but if window is open they are loud.   Staff however is excellent and prompt!  Maid service excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and yes we have many kids during the high season which numbers around 500-700 per day. A great way for them to make new friends. As for the fireworks, Disney does have a nightly show and yes they are loud. We have the best view in Anaheim and the majority of our guests love them. I apologize for the fireworks noise. thank you for your business and we hope you come back soon.

Summary: I have stayed here several times. Rooms are clean and very good for a family. On this trip we had two adjoining rooms.  One room has been recently refurbished, the other still pending refurbishing.  While the "older" room was still very nice, the newly refurbished room was just plain fun!  Tastefully decorated in cool greys, and lavender, the newer rooms capture the magic of the theme park experience. Rooms were extremely large and a roll away fit with plenty of room to spare. Bathrooms were very clean, but extremely small, with no possibility of sharing unless one person was in the shower and the other using the vanity. So our two rooms with two baths came handy. I am a platinum member and was a bit taken aback by the club lounge on this trip.  I typically visit the lounge to
Manager Response: I thank you for taking the time to let us know how your recent stay was at the hotel. I apologize for the issue you encountered with the club lounge, however we have a problem with families taking lots of water bottles, fruits, yogurts, pastries, etc. to the park and so as a family resort rather than corporate hotel, we have had to put a rule in effect that no food leaves the lounge. Again I apologize for the inconvenience. The hotel was built in 1969 when bathrooms were small and the bedrooms were large.  You are correct in that we have smaller bathrooms than usual, however can boast that we have the largest guest rooms in the Anaheim area. Thank you for your business and we hope that we may once again have the opportunity to serve you.

Summary: Perfect location for Disney. Shuttle bus goes  every 15 mins and is only 5 mins away from the gates. Restaurant foodie is good . We ate there the two nights as Disney restaurants were full and had long ques ( lines) free wifi  in large reception area . At 21:30 you get a great view of the firework display from the entrance area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the hotel and I was glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We are very proud of our restaurants and the food has been rated as outstanding by the majority of our guests. We hope that you come back soon to see us.

Summary Heading: Great Disneyland hotel for the family!
Summary: We booked a last minute splurge spring break trip to Disneyland. It was a blast!!   If you are looking for the most current interior decoration - this hotel isn't for you. If you are looking for contemporary, marble, glitz and glamour, this hotel isn't for you. If you're looking for a place to rest your head and re-fuel between shuttle rides to Mickey, Minnie, Elsa & Anna, you'll do just fine at the Sheraton Anaheim.    Pros: Great Disneyland Shuttle service with helpful drivers with a sense of humor. Hotel is great for families - nice but not TOO nice (if you know what I mean). The waiters in the restaurant for breakfast were very friendly. The deli offering fresh made sandwiches and wine for mommy were a plus! Pool was welcoming. Nothing was overdone but everything was
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and the 4 star rating. We appreciate your business and look forward to your return.

Summary: The location and room size are great.  We could walk to Disneyland from the hotel which only took us 15 minutes.  The shuttle starts running 30 minutes before the park opens and for us crazies, that wasn't early enough so we walked instead.  We were fortunate to receive a suite upon our middle of the night check-in and were surprised by how big our room was.  The bathroom was a bit dingy as were the hotel hallways (buckling carpet, chipped paint and outdated light fixtures) but who's spending that much time in the hall or your room anyway when you're in Anaheim!  I wanted to give this 3.5 stars but that wasn't an option so defaulted to 4.  Rooms were super quiet and staff was incredible friendly.  We didn't get to use any other amenities as we spend our days in
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and yes our hallways will be updated beginning April 20, 2015 with a brand new face lift. We are currently undergoing a renovation program of many of our guestrooms and public areas. Please come back and visit us again in the future to see the changes we are making.

Summary: We had a fantastic one night stay at the Sheraton Anaheim Hotel in February. Given the price of this room (low) I wasn't sure what to expect but we just needed somewhere to rest our heads after a Disney day. The entire stay was fantastic, staff were great and the hotel was just beautiful, the grounds looked like a fairytale. Quite close to Disney and complimentary every 1/2 hour shuttle. The sweet sleeper beds afforded their usual fantastic night's sleep. I only wished we stayed longer!
Manager Response: After reading your glowing review and seeing the 5 star rating I wish you had stayed longer as well! Thank you for your business and I hope that you come back and visit us again real soon.

Summary: Pros: We stayed at the Sheraton for 3 nights. We found the rooms to be spacious and comfortable. We appreciated the free bottles of water each day and Starbuck's coffee in your room.  Great location to watch the fireworks at night from Disneyland. They have an efficient shuttle that takes you to Disneyland and California adventure. You can also buy your park tickets right there at the hotel.   Cons: They charge $14/day to park your car at the hotel!I think that is ridiculous when you are already paying for your room and park tickets.  While we greatly appreciated the shuttle to take us to and from the parks, they seats were in bad condition. Many of them were split down the middle with the stuffing showing. They could use a bit of repair work, but the drivers were friendly and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. I was glad to hear that we were able to meet your expectations and that you had an enjoyable time. We are aware that the shuttles and some areas in the hotel are showing their wear and tear and I am happy to report that we are currently undergoing a renovation program that will update many of the areas. Thank you for your business and I hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Mediocre place that does not strive for anything more
Summary: I used for a room near an elevator. I was given a room that literally was probably the farthest from the elevator. The desk clerk offered little enthusiasm and was not pleasant. The rooms are ok but nothing beyond basic. It received an average of 3 and I understand (and agree with) the rating now that I stayed there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and you will be happy to know that we are currently going through a renovation program to upgrade many of our guest rooms and public areas. This will give us the facelift and new look as we move forward into the year. We appreciate your business and hope you come back soon.

Summary: Silvia at the front desk was very friendly and allowed us to checkin early and she placed us in a renovated room!   We had breakfast one morning and Miguel our server was so genuinely nice and really took excellent care of us and the others around us too! And the buffet was delicious especially the scrambled egg frittata and the coffee!  Please thank your employees for us...we loved our stay!!!
Manager Response: On behalf of all of the employees athe hotel I would like to thank you for your wonderful review and the 5 star rating. We do our best to meet and or exceed all of our guests expectations and we seem to have succeeded with you. Please come back and visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, large beautiful gardens, STUNNING fireworks views from the pool!
Summary: A large hotel, beautuful gardens, ponds and landscaping. awesome views of disney fireworks from Sheraton pool area. Met an awesome cab driver "David" who works from their alot, he made our stay! (What a great bloke!) little tours and very informative.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us from the Gold Coast of Australia and allowing our staff to help make your holiday special. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and your driver David. We get many compliments on David and he is very knowledgeable about the area. We love our Aussie friends and hope that you and your family can return again soon.

Summary: I was attending The NAFEM conference a couple of weeks ago and stayed here for 2 nights.  My room 4-443 is located in another building which takes a few minutes to "commute" to from the lobby and restaurant. The room was large which was great but everything else went downhill from here. I was trying to connect my laptop on the desk and noticed that all the outlets were occupied by the desk lamp and phone. When I pulled out the desk chair I was surprised to find the fabric on the top considerably ripped and torn up. As I went to the bathroom, I also noticed that the vent was disgustingly dusty.  This is not what I expected from a Sheraton Standard hotel. As a SPG member, having stayed at various SPG hotels, this was by far one of the worst experiences.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel and I apologize for our hotel not meeting your expectations. We are currently going through a renovation program and many of our guest rooms will be getting a complete facelift. We hope that you will again return in the future and see that we will have a new look. Thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland but fairly vanilla
Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights in March. The hotel is on the doorstep of Disneyland but fairly uneventful therein. Very large hotel so you can get lost. I got an updated room but the rooms seem two tier (updated and not updated). Specify the former!  Pro's  -Large rooms -Multiple meal options on site -Good wifi signal in rooms  Con's  -Tiny bathrooms (see many comments in reviews) -No desk in room of you are a business traveller  -No other food options around apart from Disney -No free parking  I have previously stayed at the Sheraton Anaheim South which was further from Disney (like 5 mins) but much better (and free parking).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and yes it is easy to get lost on our 13 acre property withe many courtyards, Renovated pool area and koi pond. When a hotel goes through the renovation process they must do it in phases so yes some rooms have been updated and others are scheduled for future renovation. We are currently working on our public areas and are excited about wonderful new changes. Thank you for your business and stay tuned for future updates.

Summary: This is a great hotel. The staff are very friendly and always happy to help. The pool is clean and the gardens well kept. The thing I like about the place the most is that the rooms are absolutely huge. The room I had had two queen beds in, more than enough for a family of 4. The room also had a joining door to the pool so id recommend asking for this type of room on check in. There is a free shuttle bus to Disney which is also s lovely touch.
Manager Response: As the General Manager of the hotel I can only say thank you for such a wonderful review and the 5 star rating. We do have the largest rooms available in the Anaheim area and our complimentary shuttle is another added amenity. I thank you for your business and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Stayed here with the family while in the area to visit Disneyland for a few days.  We were overall very pleased.  The rooms are large and beds are comfortable.  There is plenty of room for a family of 4 to spread out.  The only drawbacks are the room is the bathroom is small and the sink is inside and the furniture could use a little updating.  Would help move things along in the morning if the sink was outside.  Nice grounds, pool and lobby area.  There is a small store/deli on the property that made breakfast very easy.  The shuttle bus to Disneyland is convenient, on-time, and efficient.  Nice alternative to driving and parking.  Would stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. We appreciate the 4 star rating and are glad that your stay was enjoyable. We pride ourselves at delivering the best possible customer service, and look forward to serving you once again. Thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Sheraton...thought it was a super 8 could of surprised me.
Summary: Well where do I start. Small bathrooms. From the toilet you can brush your teeth and start the shower. The toilet flushes after 3 or 4. while you shower you can soak your feet. Oh and that's all when you walk into the first room. The headboards are nasty, scratches and stains. The TV broke Changing the channels. The closet door is broken, to open you must lift it and move it when it's off the track.  Maintenance told me oh the bathrooms never work and the TV you can not change the channel fast or it will freeze And you will have to unplug it to fix it. Oh and to take the cake WiFi is $10 a day Not included. FYI no microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay with us at the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. I would first like to apologize for not meeting your expectations during your stay. As you mentioned our bathrooms are smaller than normal due to construction of the hotel in 1969 when bathrooms were not as important as the size of the guest room. Our rooms are the largest in the Anaheim resort area which does allow us to serve large families in one room. We are currently under a renovation program and are updating many of the guestrooms and public areas which will remedy the areas you pointed out.  Again I apologize and hope that you will return again in the future to see what changes have been made.

Summary: This is my favorite hotel to stay at in Anaheim area.  The grounds are beautiful and meander between the rooms that branch out in all directions.  The rooms are a little dated but the beds are super comfy.  Plus they have a lovely heated pool that has a deep end so you can really enjoy swimming and playing with the kids.  They have dedicated shuttle service to Disney and the location for seeing the fireworks cannot be beat (entrance in the parking lot).  Plus the rooms are all oversized so the family can seriously stretch out.  Great place to spend a few nights when visiting California theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the kind comments regarding the hotel. We have begun a renovation program that will update many of the guestrooms and public areas. We have recently completed a pool renovation and are looking to remodel the lobby area as well. We appreciate your loyalty to the hotel and hope that you will come back to visit us again real soon.

Summary: The staff was very nice. Felt the rooms and hallways were dated and could stand to be redone. The bed was comfortable, the bathroom had two sinks. One nice thing was they offered free bottled water. Was nice to have shuttle service to Disneyland, but the buses were rundown inside with ripped seats. The drivers were very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and yes we are in the process of renovating our hotel and and updating many of our guestrooms and public areas. We appreciate your business and hope that you will come visit us again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland with frequent shuttles
Summary: First time staying here and used our SPG points for a free night which gave us a standard 2 queen bed and rollaway room for my family of 5, free parking and WiFi. Everything was pretty outdated from the room decor to furniture/bedding. Our room was supposedly ready when we checked in which was quick being a Gold SPG member but when we got to our room, no rollaway bed as we were promised. I called the front desk to advise them and the response was they thought it was already there but will deliver now, which took 30mins to deliver. The room itself was spacious enough for us for the 1 night except for the bathroom. It was an all in one where the sink the toilet and the shower/tub was all behind one door, so not much room to handle small kids in there with a grown adult helping
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind and honest review regarding your recent stay with us. Yes, we are an older hotel built in 1969 and back then the bathrooms were much smaller than those built today. I apologize for your rollaway bed not being in your room at the time of check in as we normally make sure advanced requests are filled. I am also glad that you enjoyed the complimentary wi-fi and parking as well as the complimentary shuttle to and from Disney as we appreciate your Gold SPG status. Thank you again for your business.

Summary: This is a sort of iconic property that really needs a complete renovation. The location is great, the feel is good, the gardens are nice but it is a run-down property. As you enter the large lobby you have the feeling that you step back in Elvis Presley's time. Carpets that are older than a lot of guests and ageless furniture welcome you to a bygone era. I was upgraded to a suite but when I stepped in a gross smell unwelcomed me. Spacious but so old! Bathroom is dated too. The noise from the passing cars was unbearable at times. When I brought these issues to the front desk supervisor, the bored gentleman replied that "other people stayed in that room" but he did not specify whether that happened last week or twenty years ago.  The club lounge has the same feel. The food all
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your honest review of the hotel and your recent stay. We are currently undergoing a renovation program which as you may or may not know is done in stages over a period of time so as not to disrupt business. We are giving many of our guest rooms and public areas a new look. Again thank you for the review and we look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: Seeing how it was Valentine's Day we were already under the impression that wait times would be longer seeing as we just finished a long day at Disneyland.   The bellman was extremely rude and the parking is ridiculous. They directed us to park on a red curb (which stated clearly tow away zone). All staff said it was ok but it was still weird.  Our Bellman Left us twice and rushed us to our room.   Upon arriving into out room there was hair floating in the toilet. The draining in the shower leaves you standing in your own puddle of dirt.Want to watch a good movie? Hopefully your TV works but here's a tip as the front desk told me-- if your remote doesn't respond just unplug the TV and that should do it!   The cherry on top was that our bedding was absolutely repulsive. By this
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of your recent trip and we apologize for not meeting your expectations during your stay. Our goal is to try and offer the best customer service possible and I am sorry that your experience was less than our goal. We do appreciate your business and hope that you will stay with us again when the opportunity arises.

Summary Heading: horrible experience shame on you Sheraton
Summary: Review couldn't be any worse, no customer service, remote didn't work, second remote didn't work, when I asked for some compensation about the remote they gave me attitude and then gave me my receipt. When I said "oh, no compensation huh?" he angrily said "it's right there" credited me 25.00$ when I got home I noticed they had the wrong room # and took out an additional 250.00 out of my debit card mind you I already paid them 200.00 cash and 25.00 out of my debit card. took 2 weeks to refund the difference, When I asked for any compensation or a comp room they said "NO"
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for the fact that your TV remote was not working properly during your stay with us recently. Our compensation of $25.00 is a fair amount for your inconvenience and we do not comp a room for an inoperable remote. We apologize for not meeting your expectations during your stay.

Summary: We have stayed at this property multiple times, most recently last Sunday night. I requested two larger connecting rooms at time of reservation, and followed up with a call to the front desk the day before to make sure my requests were noted. We arrived at the hotel about 10am and were pleasantly surprised to find that our rooms were ready for early check in, and we were given exactly what I asked for-the BIG rooms, with a connecting door. I was told that these were renovated rooms, but I honestly can't say that they appeared better than what I remember from a year ago. We had a minor plumbing issue in that the sink in one of our bathrooms was disconnected at the trap underneath, so all the water ran on the floor. Our husbands were able to fix it.  Overall, I like this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and we appreciate your loyalty to the property. As of May 23, 2015 we are going to re-brand ourselves as an independent hotel and nothing will change but the name. Ownership and management company stays the same as will all of our executive staff and associates. We are currently going through a renovation of the property including many of our guest rooms and public areas.  We hope that you will be returning soon to the hotel so that we may once again serve you.

Summary: We booked our trip via our Delta.com account, as they are connected with Starwood and considered a Disneyland Good Neighbor.  What a mistake!  We arrived very late with two tired children (age 4 and 19 months).  We checked in just fine and though the hotel is older and had an older "smell" about it, the lobby wasn't too terrible.  We we given our room assignment and directions on how to get to our room.  My husband went to park the car and I pushed the stroller with a sleeping baby and helped my 4 year old drag himself down this incredibly long hallway.  where we then had to go OUTSIDE to get to the next building and then down some stairs.  Remember, I am dragging a 4 year old and pushing a stroller with a baby in it, how I have to go down some steps?  Couldn't the guy at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the hotel and I am sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. We are currently undergoing a renovation program and many of our guest rooms and public areas will be included in the makeover. Our complimentary shuttle to and from the park drops off and picks up at the same exact spot every 30 minutes and our bus is clearly painted Sheraton Anaheim. I apologize for the fact that you were misinformed about pick up location. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: If you have kid and want to stay near Disnelyland, this is the place.  The staff are very friendly and very helpful.  Ask for the room with Castle Bunk bed.  The kids will love it.  They do have free shuttle to Disneyland every half hour.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind remarks regarding our hotel and and our new bunk bed rooms. These were part of our new renovation and they are being received very well. As a family destination hotel, we feel we meet the mark in every way including the fact we operate the complimentary shuttle service to and from the park every 30 minutes. We appreciate your business and hope that you come back soon.

Summary: Strange, do not know where all the bad reviews come from !!!  We stayed for 4 Days with the Kids & Grand kids and had a wonderful time.  Yes it is not a newer hotel, could say it was a little tired, however that being said it was clean and comfortable (beds were outstanding). It was not a refurbished room either.  Staff were VERY friendly and tended  to our every need. Bar & Food service was excellent .  Excellent value and a 15 minute walk to the Disneyland, or 5 minutes to the garage where you can pick up the Disneyland Tram.  If your visiting Disneyland a very comfortable and economic place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review and kind comments regarding our hotel, Staff, and shuttle service. we were built in 1969 so yes we don't have the glass and brass look of other hotels but we do have the castle theme which is great for families. Our new renovation program has been a hit especially our new bunk bed rooms. We appreciate your business and hope you come back soon.

Summary: We found this to be a lovely hotel within a 10-15 minute walk of Disneyland - we like walking and it's only an additional 5 minutes compared to official Disneyland properties. The staff was very kind and attentive, the hotel rooms were clean and the maid service excellent. It has a pool and several lovely outdoor areas with a large garden. We had no issues with the room. I realize some people may say the room décor is “dated,” but I’m much more concerned about value and cleanliness. The only recommendation would be for them to update the carpeting in the halls in places where you can tell it’s had some traffic over the years. The hotel lobby, restaurant and bar area are completely updated from a modern perspective and that was good enough for us.
Manager Response: We thank you for the 5 star rating and a wonderful review of the hotel. We will be changing the hall way carpet within the next 60 days as well as other renovations. Our staff does everything possible to meet the expectations of our guests and it looks like we hit a home run with you! The fact we are located on 13 acres of gardens, courtyards, and koi ponds allows for a complete family getaway while visiting Disneyland. Thank you for your business and we hope to serve you again real soon.

Summary: This place was an excellent choice to stay, while visiting the Disneyland Resort. The experience, from check in to check out was great.   When checking in, the host at the desk offered much information about the hotel and the shuttle bus. The rooms were proven to be upgraded from many years of use but that's to be expected from a hotel that's been there for years.   The shuttle is great as well. It leaves before the park opens and then departs every 30 minutes after until about an hour after the park closes. It does this when picking you up at the resort as well. The drivers are very nice and helpful. If you have a stroller, they will store it in the rear (all they ask is for you to collapse it, if possible). It beats having to drive there each time.   The hotel isn't hard to
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and review of our hotel. I see that you have stayed in other properties in Anaheim before and we appreciate your business. I hope that you can visit us more than once a year so that we may serve you once again.

Summary: Stayed for a three day weekend.   The staff is super friendly and attentive.  If you spend any time at the bar ask Sherry to make you her famous Bloody Mary.  It's a winner.  Yes, this hotel is old but it's clean and comfortable.  It was a plus to not only have a restaurant on site but a handy deli where they fresh-make your sandwiches.  The rooms are spacious and the pillows and bedding first-rate.  Ten minute free shuttle ride to Disneyland.  Oh, and the pool is large and so is the spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and the staff. I will pass your comment on to our associates and I know that they will all enjoy the fact that we met your expectations, especially your favorite bartender. We thank you for your business.

Summary: Very helpful and friendly staff, both in the reception and in the bar. Ate in the bistro which was nice enough, again service excellent. I still dont understand why wifi is only available free in the lobby in this age. Room was on the shabby side, clean but in need of attention. Friends had a refurbished room which was very different. Bed Comfortable and the room was spacious. Lovely display of fireworks too.
Manager Response: We appreciate your taking time to review the hotel and are happy that we met your expectations. Our staff prides themselves on delivering the best customer service possible and they work on exceeding our guests expectations whenever possible. We are currently in the process of upgrading many of our guest rooms and public areas and you will see the transformation over the next couple of years. We look forward to your next visit and thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel really near from Disneylan
Summary: The hotel is really near from Disneyland entrance and a 10-15 minutes walk to  Downtown Disney through the Grand Californian Lobby. Staff was friendly and helpful as the front desk girl try to look for the room in which we could get the best view of the night fireworks at Disneyland.   Although the room was not ready yet, she gave me a key so we could go and grab something at the executive lounge, where you can grab all day long, water, soft-drinks, cookies, fruit and by five o'clock free alcoholic drinks and hors d'oeuvre.  Staying at the club level gave us a better view of fireworks and World of Color so paying a little bit more was worth it.  Some of the rooms have a full balcony where you can seat and watch Disneyland fireworks or the World of Color show of California
Manager Response: Thank you for your great 5 star review and we appreciate your business. Please come back and visit us again real soon.

Summary: I booked our room stating I had 6 guests knowing rollaway beds were available. We asked for 2 rollaway beds and was told we could only have one because of hotel policy. We read the policy on the website and it stated we could have 2 for a standard room. My niece had to sleep on the floor which wasn't a nice experience for her first trip to Disneyland. I was told that the room would accommodate 5 and if we wanted we would be able to squeeze a 6th person.  I later did a chat on the hotels website and was informed that the policy is different with each Sheraton and the Sheraton we stayed at should really only allow 4 in the room not 5 or even 6. I asked both the front desk and the gal on the chat how I could be allowed to book 6 people in one room if it didn't not accommodate 6 but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we did regarding your recent stay at the hotel. I apologize for any mix up regarding the rollaway bed situation and yes you are correct in that every Sheraton may have different policies on rollaways due to the size of the rooms. I was glad to hear that you found our beds comfortable and I hope that you will come back again so that we may serve you once again.

Summary: The hotel is a bit old but rooms are large and comfortable. Hotel is conveniently located if you want to go to the parks, plus they offer free transfer. There are not great restaurant options inside the hotel, but one can find many restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Sheraton Anaheim and i am glad that you enjoyed the hote and staff. Our complimentary shuttle service is an asset for our guests and we are only minutes from the parks. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I loved staying here for my recent Disney races. The front desk staff were super helpful, although I got yelled at for coming into the bar without ID (I'm 27) to order lunch. The pool was great, and the hot tub was wonderful after races. The hotel is within walking distance to the park and Downtown Disney, so you can leave your car at the hotel and not worry about parking! We had a ground room just outside the pool. I found it to be larger than most with comfy beds. Would definitely stay here again!  (but always bring your ID to the bar area!)
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star rating of our hotel during your recent stay. I hope you placed well in the marathon! Your kind comments will be shared with our staff and I know they will appreciate them. I do apologize for the bartenders requesting ID however California has very strict laws on minors in the bar area and I take it that you look very young. Please accept my apology if they did yell at you. I hope you can come back for the Tinkerbell Marathon in May and allow us to serve you again.

Summary Heading: Good hotel but room could use some maintenance
Summary: This Sheraton in my opinion is one of the nicer hotels in Disneyland proximity. What better suits the Disney theme than a fantasy castle? The hotel ground is quite pleasing and the location is wonderful. Although it is a bit further from most of the restaurants and shops, Disney is within a really short walking distance. It's so close to the park, in fact, you can get a fantastic unobstructed view of the nightly firework right at the parking lot (or the comfort of your own room if your  window faces the right direction)  I found the hotel staff helpful and friendly. Check-in was quick and easy. They were quick to answer any questions we had and provided good recommendations for late night dining.   The standard room is of decent size although bathroom could really be bigger. Bed
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of our hotel and staff, and the fact that your expectations were met. The hotel was built in 1969 which at the time, bathrooms were not quite as large as they are today. We are going through a renovation program which will update many of the guestrooms as well as some public areas. We do listen to our guests and try to upgrade the areas that they feel need upgrading. Thank you again for your input and I hope you are able to visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Looking forward to returning for Christmas 2016
Summary: My wife & I stayed at the Sheraton Anaheium Hotel back in October of 2010. We were celebrating our first year anniversary, like many Australians spending plenty of time at Disneyland & Universal Studios. We arrived from LAX around 8am to find the wonderful castle that is the Sheraton. Staff were lovely upon arrival and informed us that our room was not yet available but after a long journey we were ok to chill out in the lobby. The staff must have noticed us nodding off so they upgraded us to a king room so we could unpack and get some much needed sleep. After re charging our batteries we headed off to Disneyland that night for Halloween.The shuttle to & from Disneyland was fantastic. The entire time of our week long stay was a joy. Our no smoking king room was huge and very
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review of the hotel and our dedicated staff. It sounds as if your stays with us have been great experiences and your expectations met. We welcome your return for Christmas 2016 and yes a Bi-Level suite might be what you need. We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel and we look forward to serving you again next year.

Summary Heading: Very Pleasant Family Friendly Anaheim Oasis
Summary: Just spent a very pleasant few days as a family of four at the Castle themed Sheraton Hotel in Anaheim.   After travelling around California staying in various 4-5 star Hotels this property proved to be a very restful, family friendly oasis.  The purpose of our stay was to spend a day at Knott's Berry Farm and a day touring around the beach suburbs of Laguna, Newport & Huntington. This was easily done with a car using the Sheraton as a base.  This property is older style and there is no doubt that it is in need of some renovations but, as a whole it is clean, tidy and genuinely cared for by the management and staff.   Check in was fine but Front Office personnel really need to be trained to say "hello & welcome" as their first words as opposed to "name,id & credit card".  If you
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind detailed review of the hotel and I will share this review with our staff as they enjoy hearing what our guests have to say. We are currently under a renovation program which will give us a facelift in many of our guestrooms and public areas. We look forward to your return stay and thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Conveniently located to the Disney parks
Summary: Always clean and staff is very friendly!  Free shuttle which is wheelchair accessible to and from Disney.  My teenage son and I have walked it but it is quite a hike over the freeway.  Food is really good as well.  The breakfast buffet is delicious!  This is usually the first place my family and I look into staying at when we travel there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Sheraton Anaheim and I hope you can visit us again soon from Valencia. We thank you for your business and strive to meet all of our guests expectations. Please let us know if we can assist you in anyway on any of your future stays.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights as part of Titan Holidays "California and the Golden West" tour and found it an excellent hotel, with great facilities, rooms and service from the staff. It's very conveniently located for Disneyland, with a regular half-hourly shuttle bus, although without rushing we walked to Downtown Disney within 15 minutes. Our tour group had a great welcome on arrival, with a member of staff giving us a quick overview of things and providing a free range of drinks (wine/beer/soft). Rooms were spacious and clean, with comfortable beds and we had no complaints throughout our stay. Staff in the bar were friendly and very chatty and the restaurant experience was equally as good, with courteous service from all the staff and good food. The lobby area, with
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel after your Titan Tour. I was glad to hear that you had the opportunity to experience the entire hotel and all that it offers. Your kind comments will be shared with our entire staff and I know that they will appreciate the fact that we met your expectations. I hope that you will have another opportunity to visit us so that we may serve you once again.

Summary Heading: Castle design is one of a kind!
Summary: We have stayed twice and have found nothing but excellent opinion of hotel. My fiancé and I love the unique flavor this particular sheraton offers. While other places might have more smoke and mirrors. I find myself always surprised by the architecture we find here. From the brick work to the court yards. 3rd trip just booked for MLK weekend Star Wars run. Prices are more than reasonable for these accomodation.  Plus, they treat your pets like family! So cute they give out dog treat, feeding and sleeping bed.:)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your 3rd stay. We appreciate your business and your kind comments about our Castle design and all of our staff works very hard to deliver the best customer service possible. We are not smoke and mirrors as you say and what you see is what you get. Thank you again for your loyalty.

Summary: We are repeat guests to the Sheraton Anaheim because of the convenience of the easy & direct Disneyland shuttle, HUGE size of the rooms and lovely restful grounds. At Thanksgiving, we had 3 rooms for family and everybody was happy. We also like it because after wearing ourselves out at Disneyland, it is quiet and AWAY from the fray & busy hubbub of Harbor Blvd where so many other hotels are located.
Manager Response: The review you wrote was most kind and we thank you for your business. We are off the hub bub of Harbor blvd. and our complimentary shuttle is a welcome amenity that the majority of our guests use to and from Disneyland. We hope that you come back soon.

Summary: I did not stay here-however, I did have a reservation through booking.com. I booked a 2 bed hotel room for 2 nights. I planned to meet my younger brother and his girlfriend for a post-Christmas visit and Disneyland outing. However, my husband and I had some issues with our work schedule and were unable to arrive for the first night. My brother, new to reserving a hotel, went ahead and booked a room for himself and his girlfriend. This left me trying to get out of our reservation entirely. I was already passed the deadline to cancel and receive an entire refund. However, when my brother spoke with the manager, David Evans, he went above and beyond and gave us the refund. Also, the room that my brother and his girlfriend received was amazing! My husband and I showed up to take
Manager Response: This is a first for us to receive a wonderful review from someone who has not yet stayed with us. I spoke with David and he did remember you and family and said you were "some of the nicest people he has ever dealt with".  We do pride ourselves on our outstanding customer service and we enjoy serving each and every guest that we encounter. Every one of our associates does their best to meet and/or exceed the expectations of our customers. Thank you so much for taking the time away from your busy schedule to review our hotel and we hope that you come back soon so that we may serve you.

Summary: I stayed here for two days because of the proximity to the Disneyland. The place is really cozy and the people here are extremely friendly. There is a free shuttle every 1/2 hour to the Disneyland, this help as there is no restaurant nearby. The hotel cafe is not very nice and the choices of food is limited. We took advantage of the shuttle to have our meals at the Disneyland. Overall the hotel has very friendly service and the room is big and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the hotel and i am pleased to hear that your stay met your expectations. We do have both the Deli and full service restaurant in the hotel and I am wondering if you only saw the deli which offers less of a choice from the dining room? Anyway, thank you again for staying with us and I am glad that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We go to Disneyland all the time and always stay at this hotel. Very friendly staff, clean and beautiful updated rooms. Excellent food. Disneyland shuttle is a life saver. Runs every half hour and if there is no room left on the bus the promptly have another available. They are remodeling the rooms which were fine before but the new rooms are beautiful. You can request specific rooms which we do every time and almost always get what we want as long as I note it in the reservations. When you walk in the first thing you notice is the mandarin mint smell that fills the hotel lobby. We have never had a problem. Parking and rooms are very secure. We love our castle by the freeway and all the staff!!!!!!
Manager Response: What a wonderful review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and I thank you for all of your kind comments. I will be sure to share with our entire staff and i know that they will also be pleased that you are very happy with our newly renovated guestrooms and our overall customer service. We thank you for your business and look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Staff is great, but time for a Renovation
Summary: So I usually stay at the Sheraton Park Hotel but that was sold out so I decided to keep it in the SPG family and stay here. I have to say the staff were very pleasant and actually had a conversation with you like they knew you for years-a really nice touch. The rooms on the other hand are long overdue for a makeover....as SPG Platinum I did get access to the lounge and I have to say the rooms are quite large...but there is little furniture in them that in some way, it looks a little out of sorts. Be prepared for a little noise at night as due to the extremely close proximity to Disneyland, you get the fireworks show right in the parking lot! It completely scared me as I was parking my car but found it quite funny that a number of car alarms went off as well. I am glad to read
Manager Response: Dear Valued Platinum member, I thank you for your honest review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. You are correct in that we pride ourselves in delivering the best possible customer service and meeting the expectations of all of our guests. Our renovation program is geared towards our guest rooms as phase one and on to the public areas for phase two. As a 47 year old hotel, it is impossible to try and compete with the newer brass and glass hotels so we make up the difference with our outstanding staff and great customer service. Thank you again for your loyalty to the Starwood program, and for your valued business.

Summary: I stayed here with my grandson for three nights for a whirlwind weekend at Disney.  The hotel is clean and quiet, could use some updating though.  I would've given it five stars, but the cleaning staff left a razor blade on our bathroom counter which luckily I found before my grandson got ahold of it.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review regarding your stay and I am glad that you and your grandson enjoyed your time with us. I apologize for the razor being left in the room and the housekeeper missing that item. We will look forward to your next with us and hope that you enjoy the Holidays ahead.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, pity about the location
Summary: My wife and I stayed in this hotel as part of a tour with Titan Travel and found it to be a nice, clean, roomy hotel with large bedrooms and an excellent restaurant.  The only downside is that it is surrounded by freeways and the only way in and out is in a vehicle.  Titan presumably decided to locate us there instead of Los Angeles due to its proximity to Disneyland - odd for a coachload of tourists whose average age was about 60!

Summary Heading: Always enjoy this Hotel, just wish I new the Pool/Jacuzzi was closed.
Summary: This is a great Hotel to stay at when going to Disneyland.  We usually walk, but there is a shuttle that leave ever 30 min, so when finished at Disneyland/California Adventure, almost always take the shuttle back.  It leave exactly on time, so 2 minutes late, will not work.  They are on the hour and half hour at the Hotel and the 15 and 45 min at the Parks.  Anyway, since I am at Starwoods Preferred Guest, the water in the room in Complimentary, which is a nice feature.  They have a little snack bar/gift shop in the Lobby for a quick snack, and the rooms all have Coffee Makers and Fridges.  They are especially large room and clean, and quite.  Just the noise in the Halls, from Kids running!  I had booked a room with my Disney Pass Holder Card, and didn't get it renewed till the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and I apologize for you not knowing about the pool renovation. We have had it up on our web site for about 2 months and Central reservations has been informing all guests as well. The pool area will be reopened mid December and i believe that you will be amazed at the new new look and transformation. As a repeat loyal guest, I thank you for your business and I am glad that you are able to enjoy all of the amenities that we offer. We look forward to your next visit and once again thank you for your patronage.

Summary: My wife and i stayed here beginning of November. Hotel was quite nice and the rooms were a nice size. A very spacious property. What is great is the proximity to Disneyland resort and the parks. There is a free shuttle that leaves
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. Our complimentary shuttle service is one of our wonderful amenities that we offer to all guests. It departs on a round trip basis every 30 minutes and affords our guests the ability to not have to worry about driving to the park. We are only a mile from the park entrance. As you mentioned the hotel is very spacious offering the largest rooms in the Anaheim area and we are located on 13 acres of plush Gardens, Lawns, court yards, and a koi pond. Thank you for your business, and we hope you come back soon to visit.

Summary Heading: Our preferred hotel of choice for the Disneyland Resort area
Summary: We've stayed here many many times over the past 7 or so years and have never, ever had any issues. I always seem to get a fairly decent AAA rate, and for the Saturday of Thanksgiving weekend, I'd say $115 a night is pretty darn good!  That said, this review is actually for the newly renovated rooms. We were put into a newly renovated room this trip and the upgrade is very nice. They're definitely going for the "medieval" theme given the architecture of the building, which is perfect!  The colors are grays, silvers and burgandys with dark (I think it was black but maybe deep blue) carpeting. Very nice patterns. The furniture is all new, aside from the bed which I believe was not changed out (at least it appeared to be older, but still super comfortable). Bed linens and curtains -
Manager Response: Your review of our newly renovated rooms was an excellent review and I thank you for taking the time to outline all ares. You are correct in that the tile and counters in the bathroom were not changed out in phase one of the renovation due to timing issues as those areas require the rooms to be out of order for a longer period of time and we needed the rooms for occupancy as quickly as possible. The horse pictures are giving the room a more Castle theme revolving around Knights and Kings, etc. and the children seem to enjoy the many different horse pictures that we display. The pool area will be completed prior to Christmas and will also have a brand new look and atmosphere. Stay tuned for future renovations as we continue to transform ourselves into a more unique Castle hotel than we are today.

Summary Heading: Good Location, Great staff but needs some work
Summary: Booked through Expedia as hotel itself showed no availability online but do not recognise my Gold starwood membership as booked through third party.  Not the best first impression when the "bellboy" said he could not help me with my bags until I check in??? strange attitude ?   Rooms are been redeveloped needed but we where comfortable.  Staff where fantastic in particular F and B and the chefs where great in providing bespoke meals for our daughter with allergies
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and I would like to apologize for the less than acceptable treatment you received upon your arrival. I have discussed with our bell Captain and he will be meeting with all of our bellstaff to be sure this doesn't happen again. I was glad to hear that our chefs were able to be sure that your meals were compatible with all of your family members. Thank you for your business, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We visited this property for the second time earlier this month.  I was delighted to find that the dining, service and convenience was equal to what I had found during a previous stay in May 2013. My husband and two young adult sons enjoyed a room on the ground floor for a week of fun at Disneyland.   I highly recommend this location for anyone wishing to reach Disney locations for any length of time.  The main advantage of this hotel is their shuttle system to the front entrance to Disneyland. This shuttle runs dependably, comfortably, and often. I have found that the hotel is careful to tailor the shuttle to the opening, early opening and extended hours of the park. One night I was even surprised to find that the shuttle would run longer because the park had unexpectedly
Manager Response: Thank you for your very kind review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. You have pointed out all of our wonderful features and I thank you for a thorough review. I am going to share this review with our entire staff as they will be delighted to see that their hard work and efforts do pay off. I thank you for your repeat business and we look forward to serving you once again in the near future.

Summary: My wife, two young daughter and I stayed here during thanksgiving week.  We stayed here about 2 years prior and were happy with the hotel.  I reserved the breakfast included rate, and would not suggest doing that.  two years ago it was worth it, but not now.  they use to offer made to order omelets, but when I asked this time I was told very ruddily, you can order one, but you have to pay for it". I know I have a coupon for the breakfast, but they act like I did not pay for my breakfast, but actually it would have been about the same price if i did not pay.  Two days later at breakfast, I get my bill and I sign it.  I walk out and I am waiting for the disney bus when the rude waiter runs out after me and says I did not pay for the whole bill. I asking him what he is talking
Manager Response: Let me first apologize for the incident in our restaurant as that is very unusual to be treated in such a fashion. I have discussed with our restaurant manager and he is going to review with all members of his staff. In regards to the hotel itself, we are currently renovating many of our guestrooms and public areas. This also includes our pool area as well. We pride ourselves at delivering great customer service and it sounds as if we did not meet your expectations for which I apologize once again. Please come back and visit us soon.

Summary: Cracks around the walls show the aging of this hotel. The decor seemed older as well. It seems that they put all of their money into the lobby area which looks really nice, but then when you get down the hallways and into your room you will see that it is all a cover-up to make it look much nicer than it is. The restaurant has super over-priced food. The good side is that the staff is friendly
Manager Response: In regards to your review of the Sheraton Anaheim, I am pleased to announce that we are currently renovating many of our guest rooms and public areas. The hotel was built in 1969 which does make us an older property however we have the largest guestrooms in the Anaheim area. Our staff delivers excellent customer service and we try to meet and or exceed all of our guests expectations. Thank you for your business and we hope you will come to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Proximity to Disneyland, yes - Friendly Staff, yes - Value, meh
Summary: Don't confuse Sheraton Anaheim with Sheraton Park Anaheim - they are close to each other but two different hotels. Our travel agent accidentally booked at the Park one instead of with our party at the Sheraton Anaheim so they had to rebook us. This review is for Sheraton Anaheim.  First the staff was super friendly and accommodating - that's the best thing about the hotel.  The food at the Garden Bistro was decent but the prices were woohoo high. They have a good breakfast buffet. Don't order room service just make the walk to the restaurant if you are going to eat hotel food. Otherwise you'll pay a 17% service charge (that's not gratuity) - you'll still be expected to pay gratuity on top of that.  Shuttle to Disneyland was super convenient and drivers were really nice and
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. Our complimentary shuttle service runs every 30 minutes and as you stated the drivers and staff are all very friendly and we pride ourselves at delivering great customer service. We thank you for your business and hope that we can serve you once again on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Yes teeny bathroom but so what...
Summary: Went for an adult girls vacay to Disneyland. The place was quiet and although families were there we didn't feel overwhelmed and it was a muted volume. Free convenient shuttle to the park, a nice restaurant and bar area. The Cobb salad was one of the freshest and best I've ever had. Yes there are imperfections ( the chair in the room had a worn seat..occasional chip inthe paint etc) No mold No bugs No stains..the beds were comfortable and I forgot to ask where they got the bed pillows as they are to die for..the bathroom would be tight for 2 at a time but it was clean functional and updated. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and letting us know about your stay. I was glad to hear that you had a good time and that you enjoyed many of our amenities. We are in the process of renovating our guest rooms and some public areas. I apologize for the worn chair in your room however this will be rectified shortly. We appreciate your business and hope that we may soon have the opportunity of serving you again.

Summary Heading: Beware they will try and change the cancellation policy
Summary: Be very careful when making reservations at this hotel. I clearly had a reservation that had a cancellation policy of 6:00pm the day prior to arrival. I checked this prior to making my reservation and it was also stated on my email confirmation. When calling more than one week prior to arrival I was told it was a no cancellation reservation. After several phone calls and frustration I was able to cancel it. Not worth the grief they put you through.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your frustration with your reservation. Not knowing the details I would first like to apologize for any inconvenience you encountered with your cancellation. There are some special rates that we offer that have a no cancellation clause, and/or there are some on line booking sites that also have a no cancellation without penalty program. it sounds however that you were able to clear up the issue and again I apologize for any misunderstanding.

Summary: This place has a little less of the family friendly atmosphere although there were definitely families staying there.  What I'm trying to say is that it was a little more quiet than the place I stayed when I brought my family to Disneyland a few years ago. Since I was there with my husband and no kids the quiet was most welcome.  We found the service to be excellent.  The breakfast was generous but there was no toast.  The coffee was surprisingly drinkable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and yes we are a family oriented hotel however with fewer families in the off season. During the Spring and Summer we cater to the majority of our business being families on vacation. Our coffee in the restuarant and guestrooms is Starbuck's brand and that is a Sheraton standard. You bring up a good point regarding the toast and this is something we will look in to. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Don't listen to the negative reviews!
Summary: This was our third visit to this Sheraton in the past 2 years and honestly I don't knoow what all the fuss is about regarding the "old: condition of the hotel.  Yes it has been there for a while but it sure is evident that the interior has been updated. Fresh paint, new carpet and updated furniture. The lobby was decorated for Halloween and there was a cozy fire in the fireplace when we returned from a long day at Disneyland. The SHUTTTLE is worth every penny you pay for the room. Consistently right on time and drops you off right at the front gate. If you parked at Disneyland you would have too ride the tram and then hike to the front gate. Even better the shuttle is free and runs every half hour. ONE piece of advise - if you book through Hotels.com please make sure your
Manager Response: First of all I would like to thank you for your kind review and loyalty for the Sheraton Anaheim. Secondly, let me apologize for the inconvenience you encountered at our front desk. We strive to meet all of our guests expectations and we seemed to have dropped the ball here. Many of our negative comments come from travelers expecting a high rise brass and glass hotel which we are not. we are a 47 year old 3 story hotel located on 13 acres of plush gardens, court yards and a koi pond. What we lack in "newness" we make up for in personality. Again thank you for your business and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Spent 2 nights here while attending a convention.  The hotel is older but seems to be in good shape. The room I had was large. It was clean and comfortable. They have a shuttle service which runs to DL from 30 min before the park opens to 30 minutes after closing. Was there only to sleep & shower so didn't use pool or other facilities. All in all I thought it was nice enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. Yes we are a little older than most hotels however we are currently going through a renovation program and are giving ourselves a new look. Our complimentary shuttle service to and from the Disney area is one of our services that we offer to our guests so that they can enjoy the park and not worry about parking their own vehicle. Again thank you and we appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the near future.

Summary: I would only recommend this hotel if you just want a place to stay and you get a great rate. The rooms aren't easy to find and the carpet they use isn't good to roll wheeled suitcases long distances. The bathroom was extremely small. The Club Lounge isn't open 24 hours and has several signs that tips are welcome and no food or beverage can be taken away.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know your views on the Sheraton Anaheim.  As you may have noticed, we are currently undergoing a renovation and are updating many of our guestrooms and public areas.  We are a property located on 13 acres and yes we are spread out in and around plush gardens, court yards, large pool area and a beautiful koi pond. I am sorry that the rooms are spread over the property and not in a high rise fashion which does make it more difficult to navigate.  On behalf of the hotel and staff I apologize for not meeting your expectations and we hope that you will again give us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary: A good value hotel which I stayed at while attending a convention. Location was good and the rooms were clean and large. Staff were good in parts, some were excellent but some were truelly dreadful ( unhelpful & uninterested), this was a pity because they let down the good guys and what could have been a star better. An example of the bad was some one forgot my laundry so it was returned to me unwashed on my last day. The good was the bell captain who drove me in the hotel convention even though it was off schedule.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and I apologize for any of our staff that did not make your stay the best it could be. We do our best to meet or exceed all of our guests expectations and it sounds like we did not do that 100% with you. I will check to see what happened with the laundry as we do not normally have an issue in this area so it will be easy to track. I thank you for your business, and I will pass on your kind comment to our bell captain.

Summary: Pictures are very deceiving, hotel is under a lot of construction, 1st room was right next to the freeway had a large crack in the window with clear packing tap over it. 2nd room  no crack in window, and this was the executive tower, ya right.   My 7 year old daughter was shocked while in the shower, marks all over her body, maintenance was a joke. Manager Lee Peterson was rude, had an attitude and did nothing to make sure this would never happen again, he needs to be fired and hotel needs to close while being updated.  Bad lighting, no fan, ceiling cracking in the bathroom.  Hair dryer smelled like it was burning, ironing board broken, house keeping folding clean towels on the floor in the entry way.

I was on a business trip and stayed at the Sheraton due to the proximity to my business appointment.   From the outside, it has a castle-like look.   Inside a well done, muted lobby with lots of places to relax.  Beautiful sitting area with a fireplace, computer work station area, bar and restaurant.  The room itself was o.k.  It was large, nicely decorated but somewhat dated.   For a business traveler, it lacked outlets (required crawling under the desk to plug in my computer) and extra charges for parking and internet.  However, the grounds are enchanting, large with different nooks, including ponds, bridges, gazebos, fountains, gardens and benches.  The restaurant has a large outdoor sitting area with canopy and fountain view.   It had a definite castle feel, in a very
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. Yes we are a Castle themed hotel next door to Disney and are located on 13 acres of plush gardens, court yards and a koi pond. the hotel is 47 years old and so some of the things you mention we are trying to upgrade such as the number of electrical outlets in the room. With the guest room renovation currently in process many of our rooms will have this issue corrected. We thank you for your business, and look forward to serving you again.

Summary Heading: First time staying here and last time
Summary: Back in December of last year, me and may folks were offered to go to Disneyland thanks to my mom's boss. The visit to the park was amazingly well and couldn't ask for anything better...that is until we got back to the hotel which was not what I expected at all. We walk in and it smelled funny, sheets looked like they haven't been washed in a while and the air conditioner had a loud racked which made it hard to sleep. Only pro from my trip is the park and con was the room we got which was a joke. To be honest, the hotel needs some remodeling done and improvement to the rooms. We tried to talk to someone at the front desk but sadly they were like ignoring us and didn't seem to care. Next time I am staying at a hotel that has 3x better service then what we experienced. That's my
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay 10 months ago in December of 2013. Since your stay, the hotel has been involved in a renovation program, and we have been going through many exciting changes. I apologize for the hotel not meeting your expectations, and I am sure if you were to visit us once again, you would have an entirely different experience. Again I apologize for any inconvenience you encountered, and I hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: The final hotel on our grand tour and it turned out to be the best of the lot. We were greeted by smiling faces as we entered and when we were in , a nice cold beer was presented to us by Mr.Nestor Didulo, the restaurant manager. We were only there two nights but he was always checking to see if everything was OK and it was. The restaurant and bar were very good and the food was excellent. Our room was very comfortable and clean. I was a bit concerned at the close proximity of two major roads but you don't hear the traffic once inside. Excellent access to Disneyworld. It's only about five minutes by hotel-provided shuttle. Didn't have time to see anything of Anaheim itself but if this smart and attractive hotel is anything to go by we missed out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel, and our dining room manager Mr. Nestor Didulo. We do our best to meet and exceed all of our guests expectations, as well as deliver the finest customer service possible. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to next trip to our hotel. Thank you very much for your business.

Summary: We've been staying here when visiting Anaheim from our hot climate here in Tucson, Az for years and always look forward to the cool climate and of course, the Sheraton Anaheim!  We came back for our probably 100th time a few months ago and like always, we're greeted at the lobby entrance by a friendly bellman upon arrival. Every time we check in we always say how glad we are to be back and how much we missed it, and the fact that we've been coming here for years and pretty much every time, it's responded with a huge smile and a big thanks for being loyal customers. It's little things like that that make the whole experience enjoyable. We were assigned one of those gigantic rooms with the couch and two double beds towards the center of the hotel (not a good description but im
Manager Response: As I am the new General Manager in the hotel, I enjoyed hearing about the history of your stays and how the hotel has changed over the years. I appreciate your candid review about this wonderful property, and like you, I am perplexed as to how some guests review us in a negative way. we may not always meet or exceed every guests expectations, however we do everything possible to make our guests as happy as we possibly can. Thank you for your kind comments, and we look forward to your next visit with us. we thank you for your your business.

Summary: Had a great time at this hotel. The rooms are huge! We checked in quiet late at night. And were able to also do our laundry.  The hotel is very close to Disneyland. We decided to walk over rather than catch the shuttle however this cost around $5.  The rooms have everything you need except tea, good coffee though. Beds are great - we felt very refreshed waking up. And it was great having resort credit, we hard this for breakfast each morning. Was good to see there wasn't a catch with these.  Pool area looked great but we did not use this.  Would use this hotel again! Great value and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and I am glad that you had such a great time staying with us. We strive to meet all of our guests expectations and to see that you leave us with a wonderful feeling about your stay. we look forward to your next visit and we thank you for your business.

Summary: Stayed for two nights (September 10 and 11). Very close to Disneyland but quite a distance from universal studios. There were shuttles to Disneyland but not universal. Would have really appreciated shuttles to universal studios although it was approx. 45 mins away. Hotel staff helped us book our universal trip. Clean and friendly hotel. We had two bookings and we got rooms side by side so It was fantastic. Would stay again if I am in the area. Travelled with family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and we are happy that you had a pleasant stay with us. In regards to the shuttle service to Universal Studios, we do not have the volume of guests visiting the studios that we have goin to Disney, so it doesn't warrant the need for a complimentary shuttle to the studios. However there are other options to get there as you have discovered. We thank you for your business, and look forward to serving you again.

Summary Heading: Stay Away-an embarrassment to the Starwood Brand
Summary: I travel extensively for work, and am a Platinum member of Starwood. This hotel is by far the worst I have stayed at in the Starwood brand. From the moment i arrived with noone to assist with luggage, to having to change rooms because of poor AC, to dirty carpets, toilets that don't flush to worn furnishings, there was nothing about my stay that was pleasant. My advice to everyone is simply find a Motel 6 and you will do better. To Starwood, please know that this venue is an embarrassment to the brand
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel and I apologize for the property not meeting your expectations. we do our best to deliver excellent customer service to each of our guests and we must not of delivered our best to you. I would hope that you reported the maintenance issues to our front desk so that our engineering department could make the proper repairs. Again I am sorry for any inconvenience you encountered.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights last week as part of a coach tour of California. I'll be succinct - lovely clean spacious room in the Tower block, spacious and relaxing lobby, courteous and helpful staff, super regular shuttle service to Disneyland, attractive grounds, lovely pool. Well done Sheraton.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel and i was glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. We do our best to meet and exceed all of our guests expectations, and to hopefully have the opportunity to serve them again. Thank you for your kind comments once again.

Summary Heading: Can't understand all the negative reviews
Summary: After reading all the negative reviews about this hotel before our recent visit we were not really looking forward to it, What a pleasant surprise,the hotel was very attractive in a Disney sort of way,the room was very large, clean and well presented,  ,beautifully laid out gardens, nice swimming pool, food in the main restaurant was excellent,the small cafe was useful if you didn't want a large meal,they also didn't charge extra if you wanted room service, staff very pleasant and helpful,  only downside was not having access to complementary Wi-Fi in the rooms a bit penny pinching in this day and age, overall very pleased.
Manager Response: I appreciate your kind comments and agree that some guests are unhappy with the hotel as we are not a 30 story brass and glass property, but a 47 year old 3 story wonderful hotel located on 13 acres of court yards, gardens, and koi ponds. We are currently in a renovation program updating many of the guestrooms and public areas, which will give us a new look. Again I thank you for your review and thank you for your business.

Summary Heading: Okay if you're in the main building
Summary: I have now stayed at this hotel twice in July and I think it's a decent hotel overall, but I can't say it's my first choice to stay in Anaheim area.  Considering I live in Northern California (about 6 hours away), my family and I are in Anaheim quite often going anywhere between 5 to 7 times a year.  Since we do have small children, we do mainly go down to Anaheim for Disneyland.   If I wrote this review after my first stay, I would have given 5 stars.  The first time, I had the ground floor room in the main building (I know people say it's hard to get around, but it's not that bad).  The room was actually quite big with an extra closet that was great for my family.  Also I loved that they had free shuttles that seemed to be mostly on time to and from Disneyland.    However, the
Manager Response: To respond to your review regarding your stay in the executive tower, yes those rooms are a little smaller then the main building rooms. Our main building rooms are the largest in the Anaheim area and the Executive tower rooms are standard size. I apologize for the fact you were unable to stay in the main building, however we only have 361 rooms in the main building and 128 rooms in the tower. We fill the hotel during the summer and have to use both buildings. Next time you are with us, please request a main building room and we will do our best to accommodate you. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: The staff at this Hotel are excellent but being let down by the Management who do not seem to heed the repeated complaints raised by Visitors.  Having had unwanted visitors in our room as other previous Visitors appeared to have had, large cockroaches on the first night, little or no attention was done to rectify the problem. There was no follow up to ensure we were happy on our return to the Hotel in the evening. Inevitably we had visitors again on the second night! Only after making a strong complaint for the second time at the Reception was any action taken,we pointed out where the cockroaches were getting in and suggested the means to rectify the problem.  After this second complaint we were upgraded to better room. Otherwise the Hotel was good, if a little jaded. The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. I agree that the staff at the hotel are excellent as well as the management team. I apologize for the unwanted "Visitor" in your room, however California is currently in a drought situation which brings out all sorts of insects in search of water. We have an abatement program weekly where our pest control service sprays inside and out, and we try to control the population as much as we can. As you know, we are located on 13 acres of lush gardens, lawns, and rose gardens.  Please be assured that management is aware and is doing everything possible. I was glad to hear that you did enjoy your stay, and hope that you once again visit us here in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was more cost-effective than staying at a Disneyland hotel, and it was a great hotel.  There is a free shuttle to Disneyland all the time.  Even if you want to walk, it is not that bad of a walk.  They have a good restaurant in-house and can help you with Disney tickets if you don't have them already.  Note, the pool is a saltwater pool, not a chlorine pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the Sheraton Anaheim hotel. We pride ourselves at delivering wonderful customer service to each and every guest. I was also happy to hear that you were able to utilize our complimentary shuttle service to and from Disneyland.  All of us at the hotel thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon.

Summary Heading: Fine but need of a refurb
Summary: We stayed here for two nights, members of one of a number of tours the hotel services.  Check in was promptly handled in a friendly fashion.
